[h1]KART KAZANMA OYUNU[/h1]
Bu oyun tam bir kart kasma oyunudur!

Ülkemiz şartlarında oyuna artık para yatırmak lüks sayılıyor.

Bu yüzden oyuncular sanal ticaretlere atıldı. Bunlardan birisi de steam üzerinde kart kasarak paranızı katlamak, ve ben incelemelerimde tamda buna göre olan oyunları bulunduruyorum eğer paranızı iki veya üç katına çıkartıp oyun sayınızın artmasını istiyorsanız profilimi ve diğer incelemelerimi takip edebilirsiniz.

review: For those who are looking for a single player game, this is not the game they are looking for because it is an online game. Since there were no players, we were able to have fun with a group of friends for a while. But even though I have a very good system, I often experienced FPS drops and performance problems. Obviously, I wouldn't recommend it to anyone because there are no players, but if you have a group of friends and you are looking for a different shooter game, you can try it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 392, 'last_played': 1667772938}
review:
"Down To One" ist ein First-Person Multiplayer-Shooter.

Einige Spieler starten auf einer Karte, müssen Waffen, Munition, Nahrung und Wasser finden und sammeln und sich dann in einem immer kleiner werdenden Gebiet gegenseitig bekämpfen bis nur noch ein letzter Überlebender übrig bleibt. 

Klingt nach einem typischen Multiplayer, einem inzwischen ausgelutschten Genre. Und genau das ist es auch, allerdings in grottigem, völlig kaputtem Zustand. Wahrscheinlich spielt deswegen niemand diesen Haufen Datenmüll. 

 So gut wie nichts funktioniert richtig, alles wirkt als sein es noch in einem Pre-Alpha Zustand steckengeblieben. Zum Beispiel sollte man es besser vermeiden, auf einen Wachturm zu klettern, denn nach den äußerst hakeligen Steigbewegungen, bei denen man offenbar einen Teil der Animation vergessen hat, ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit sehr groß, das man einfach den gesamten Weg wieder runterfällt und die Plattform gar nicht erreicht. 

Auch ansonsten wirkt alles ungelenk, freezes sind an der Tagesordnung, gern bleibt man irgendwo hängen und das Waffenhandling ist unangenehm. Die Grafik ist auf typisch schwachem Niveau solcher Billig-Spiele, häufig ploppen Objekte einfach so im Blickfeld auf. Ohnehin scheint Vieles aus Assett-Sets zusammengesucht, teilweise passen einige Objekte in Bezug auf die Proportionen gar nicht in die Welt. So liegt zum Beispiel ein Flugzeugwrack in der Gegend rum, in das der Spieler selbst mit viel Liebe nicht mal ansatzweise reinpassen würde. 

Aber der furchtbare Zustand des Spiels ist eben gar nicht das Schlimmste. Viel problematischer ist, daß - völlig zu recht - niemand diesen Müll spielt und man allein in der leeren Welt blöd rumsteht. So etwas braucht wirklich niemand. 

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
1/10 Atmosphäre
-/10 Story
3/10 Grafik
2/10 Sound
1/10 Spielmechanik
0/10 Balancing
0/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Stellt Euch vor, es gibt ein Multiplayer-Match und keiner geht hin. Auch die Wertung ist "Down to One". 

[h1][b]1/10 Gesamtwertung

author: {'steamid': '76561198009655414', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1655348826}
review: Came to check the game out after like 6 years of forgetting it was even in my library. Obviously I only had 15 minutes at the time and remembered it was because I literally couldn't get this Unity game to launch and when it did finally work, I was in a lobby with just me and my friend. Saw that the dev's posted an update a little over a month ago from the time of this review and figured I'd give it a shot. It immediately crashed upon trying to launch it from Steam. Said it couldn't even find the .exe file lmao. Went to the installation folder and found the application and actually got it launch. Obviously there's no servers though so I tried to launch a single player world just to check out the map finally and it crashed. Tried about 3 more times and gave up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009751161', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 542, 'last_played': 1652486092}
review:
Down to One is finally back and it came back swinging!! The blazing fast Unity Engine shows what a game is meant to feel like. The controls are responsive and crisp and the environments are as pretty as ever. 
Get ready for a huge nostalgia eruption once you enter the world of Down to One!!! 
(You will have to rename the .exe and two folders for the game to even start)

author: {'steamid': '76561198866942343', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 473, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1633005093}
review:
"Dedicated Servers: Don't settle for games hosted on someone's dial-up. Our high performance dedicated servers will make multiplayer feel like you're at a LAN."

That quote from the game's description is enough to show how many fucks this company / individual / band of thieves gave about ensuring their game had any longevity after an initial flood of revenue and players. No available servers, single player mode, or ability to host a server = no playable game. Still offered for sale, so if you have $0.99 + applicable taxes that you want to waste, feel free to purchase. Who knows -- maybe in 3 more years they will have a short-lived beta again where the players who purchased it can play?

Definitely not recommended. I'll revisit in a year to see if anything has changed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057915172', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1633716570}
review:
Я один из тех счастливчиков кто смог на старте заценить мультиплеер в этой игре. Ну что сказать, задумка была интересная, в тот момент только ленивый не делал батл-роялей.
С технической стороны игра сильно хромала, разница в пинге игроков до сервера не позволяла нормально попадать в противников. Что уж там, когда ты видишь чувака, стреляешь по нему, а он тут же телепортируется метров за 100 - ну такое себе удовольствие. 
Сейчас игра мертва. Разве что вам удастся собрать 42 человека готовых в это играть :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198135445239', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1565367770}
review:
СЫРАЯ
ПАРОДИЯ НА ИГРУ
ЗА 30 РУБЛЕЙ.

Down To One - эта некая пародия на 7 days/dayz и прочий треш. 

На данный момент в игре нет серверов, а разраб ( Да, это один человек) просто забил за игру. 
Многие ревьюеры пишут, мол, что вы хотите за 30 рублей, но вот вопрос к данным персонам.

А кто заставлял разработчика продавать данное "творение геймдева" за 30 рублей? Поэтому данные претензии абсолютно бессмысленные.
Проект ни о чем, поэтому если была бы возможность сделать манибек, то я бы его сделал!

author: {'steamid': '76561198188664927', 'num_games_owned': 1605, 'num_reviews': 386, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1562004189}
review:
[h1] Game Summary: [/h1] 
This is a battle royale game, which has been growing in popularity the last few years due to the successes of titles such as Overwatch, Fortnite, Apex, etc.  Unlike many games I review though, I have almost nothing to comment on because of a cardinal flaw with these games.  They rely on a constant player base in order for people to play the game at all.  This can work, when it taps into a player base millions of people strong, so that there's always a few thousand people on at any given time.  This game was in the store back in January 2016, and as of July 2019, there's nobody who is online anymore.  That seemed to be true even as far back as 2018.  Based on other reviews, the developers dropped the price down to $1, trying to maintain a player base, but the game is already dead at this point.  Therefore, I cannot  play the game, as there's no single-player features or modes.  There's not even a training or practice mode for me to see how the mechanics work out.


[h1] Pros: [/h1] 
	• I have no idea, as I can't play the game.  My playtime stems from checking for an active server (never found one), and grinding for the trading cards.


[h1] Cons: [/h1] 
	• From what I saw under the control options, there wasn't a way to play with a controller.  Personally, I can't play shooting games without a controller.  I know that makes me a scrub, but it is what it is.  
	• No offline features, such as a practice mode, to develop skills and familiarity with the game.  Let alone play by yourself when no one else is available, let alone 40 total players.
	• There's no player base to support this title, so it's no longer a functional game.  


[h1] Conclusion: [/h1] 
The strong negative reviews seem to come from two main areas.  The first stem from those who did have the chance to try this game, and found it to be interesting initially, but failed to deliver on its ideas.  They were close, but no cigar.  The other come from those players like me.  People who have the game in their libraries, decided to try it out at some point, and found that the game was already abandoned.  No matter how amazing the game might have been, without a way to play it, it's completely worthless.  I cannot recommend this game, especially as I'm dubious it would ever have a revival.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014763908', 'num_games_owned': 2519, 'num_reviews': 331, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1467638854}
review:
You require 42 players to play a game, the all-time peak is 246 players, and it has not gotten close to that number ever again, the closest is 94 players, closest after that is 59 players, then it drops all the way down to 20 players.

Average daily peak players the last 3 years is about 5 players.

I guess this is an informational review to let you know that this game is dead and was only playable for 3 months out of the almost 5 years it's been on Steam, including the 1 year long Early Access period it had from January 2015 to December 2015.


[h1]Curator page[/h1]

[i]If you liked this review or otherwise found it helpful in deciding whether or not to buy this game, feel free to follow [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/29162366/]my Curator page[/url].[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198156231352', 'num_games_owned': 2487, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1554358244}
review:
[b] Померти не народившись [/b]

Знайшов в себе в бібліотеці гру Down To One, встановив. Думаю загляну що там і з чим це їсти, але на жаль гра мертва. В якому плані? Онлайн пустий, а без нього гра неможлива. Я подивився на сайті steamdb статистику і зрозумів, що якщо гру в місяць запускає хоч 5 людей, це вже добре ( думаю, що її ніхто і не запускає, а йде фарм карточок ). Насправді перспективи мали б бути в гри хороші, адже це та сама королівська битва в Стімі, але 2016-го року ( якщо ви не зрозуміли, то PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS 2017-го року випуску ) і гра мала шанси мати хоч мінімальний онлайн в кілька сотень. Проте не склалося. Як ви зрозуміли, пограти я не зміг, насолодився лише кривуватим меню.

Купляти гру не можна, адже це просто гроші на вітер. Вроді все, а я піду дальше розгрібати завали в бібліотеці стіму.

[h1] Не рекомендую 0/10 [/h1]

Карточки стоят не по 1.5 рубля, а по 5-7 рублей. Хотите нормальные игры? Готовьтесь отдать как минимум 300 рублей.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970064749', 'num_games_owned': 5549, 'num_reviews': 359, 'playtime_forever': 941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 941, 'last_played': 1532898519}
review:
Many games like this have perished and many more will , so is the faith of Multiplayer-only games. 

Down To One had some nice ideas but failed to deliver. A lot of work was still needed but it took too long and players left. Even dropping the game to 1 Euro did not help. What remains is a main menu screen with no option to play the game since there are no servers and I don't think there is an option to host one either.

This game shouldn't be allowed to be sold anymore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122018181', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1534438837}
review: "Down to One" é um jogo de sobrevivência e tiro em primeira pessoa desenvolvido pela "Glider Games". Ambientado em um vasto mapa de mundo aberto, os jogadores são deixados para lutar até a morte em uma competição brutal estilo battle royale. Eles devem procurar por armas, equipamentos e recursos enquanto evitam ou enfrentam outros jogadores em um ambiente dinâmico e perigoso. Com uma mecânica de jogo intensa e uma ênfase na estratégia e habilidade, "Down to One" desafia os jogadores a serem os últimos sobreviventes em uma batalha pela supremacia.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986992213', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 266, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1441679857}
review:
Down To One was a battle royale game.
Up to 42 players were able to play in a match and were trying to be the last man standing.
This game never had a huge playerbase and was no competitor at all for games like H1Z1 King of the Kill back in time.
It was full of bugs, the weapon mechanics were weird and most importantly: It was no fun to play!
The games price was initialy 14,99 Euro and dropped down to 0,99 Euro to get more players into the game.
It worked for a while but after time the players have left the game again.
Do not waste money on it. There is no one to play with. It is completely dead.

Sounds 3/10
Graphics 3/10
Gameplay 2/10
Atmosphere 1/10

If you liked my review, please feel free to follow me and/or my curator group:
http://steamcommunity.com/id/Ov3RT4K3R/myworkshopfiles/?section=guides
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/orcollective#curation

Also feel free to check out my YouTube Channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC83DYCmrWfl9ttrhX54jmWA

review: Fortnite pft forget about it, PUBG never heard of it, If you are looking for a battle royal game to get your proper stiff than down to one is the way to go, this game has amazing key feature never heard of from other battle royals such as deadly rattle snakes, trees that spawn water bottles, taking a whole new meaning to going prone by laying in the ground so only your feetsies are showing. In all seriousness this game is definetly not well made, but that doesnt change the fact that if you gather some buddies and want to have a laugh for a couple hours this game has that covered.

review:
I own this game for over 2 years now. 
Unlucky that i got a 4-pack back then i still have 2 copies im afraid to gift anyone cause the game is a hot mess.
Not a single game was readied up ever since i own this. No players or Servers are available. The Movement is awfully slow and clunky, the graphics are equal to games of the 90s. No Singleplayer or Training mode available. No Mods. No Community. No updates. No People. This Game is straight dead and never made it to beeing alive ever. Definitely dont buy this if its not only for your gamecount in the library. I wish i could just delete Games from my library but i guess this doesnt work!

author: {'steamid': '76561198279500543', 'num_games_owned': 307, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 759, 'last_played': 1586592993}
review: With a total of 12.7 hours on this game i must say i had alot of fun. Yes the servers are dead and have hardly anyone on them and only way you can play is with your friends which i did. There are many things you can do in this game buddy up with a friend and explore and find a sign with russian letters in it and procced to run through a line field. You could alsosit ontop of a mountain and watch one of your friends get harrassed by 7 rattle snakes. As for the gameplay i would rate it around a 6 out of 10. One amazing thing about the gameplay is that your always learning new things it could be how touse a sniper with no scope or you could accidently find out how to walk through walls and kill your friends. The game is also very tactical you have the abilitie to choose what camo to wear so you can blend into the enviroment, another tactical part about this game is the hiding system yes you can use your camo clothing to hide in the ground or you could just hidein one ofthe final buidlings and hide inside a desk draw and wait for the enemy to push you. Overall i believe the game is worth the money and could be worth more if the developers got back in and changed a few things like getting rid of the rattle snakes that kill you more often then players. This has been Doggers game review and i give this game 7 out of 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198036378965', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1516867926}
review:
Sometimes I think about my life and the choices I make, and get a bit dissapointed in myself, but then I just think about how awful the Devs of this game must feel.   This game is complete and utter trash.  I would be embarrased to have ANYTHING to do with its creation.  

There are no redeemable features, but there is a hideous menu with bloom so bright you'll squint, almost missing the typos in the settings ("AutJoin Servers" / "Feild of View")
There is no quirk or characteristic of this game that makes it worth the 5 minutes it takes to load into an empty server. 

"Did you want 1080p at 60hz? Too bad!  Here's 24hz instead! The only 60hz resolutions are under 1600x900 so you'd better get used to that!"  ................   "Sorry, the quit button doesn't do anything." .........  "Sorry, there's a single server that's perpetually empty, but you can stand around in a lobby with a ball that doesn't move"

I can't give any more of a review because that's EVERYTHING I was able to experience in the game.   An objectively ugly, disfuctional and unhelpful menu system, resolution bugs and graphical errors, before standing in an empty lobby about the size of a squash court with a non-functioning ball stuck to the floor.   I was unable to do anything else as a match requires the server to not be EMPTY.   I guess if you had friends that like playing awful games at awful resolutions or awful framerates, this might be something that should might consider.  

It's not worth spending ANY money on, let alone an entire dollar.  You could buy enough rope with that dollar to choke yourself, an event that would be at least twice as entertaining as this steaming pile of shame.

Waaaaw un jeu superbe il surpasse largement un GTA ou un PUBG c'est ouf...
MAIS PAS DU TOUT SA PUE LA GROSSE MERDE BORDEL A QUEUE PUTIN JE L'AI EU POUR 1$ SA PUE LA GROSSE MERDE
Le jeu se lance au bout de 6 essais (j'ai été patient) j'était dans le jeu je suis mort après 1-2 min de jeu j'arrivais pas a quitter cette bouse et pour courroner le tout l'accueil était bugué une fois que j'ai quitté le jeu si vous l'achetez pendez vous sur le champs parce que votre vie c'est de la grosse merde merci.

Výborná hra s výborným příběhem a zajimavým gameplayem, jen ty počty hráčů by mohli být vyšší. 😆

author: {'steamid': '76561198064377430', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1635, 'last_played': 1671353051}
review:
The single greatest game i have ever graced upon on steam. its like finding a cookie in a tin that you swore as a kid it was full of stupid shit but actually there is a cookie in it. or better yet, it is like finding what the meaning of life is in this horrible world that we live in today. i was just 16 years old when i played this game and over the time of me playing it i have developed into a mature young man who is a avid Down To One player and i cannot stress this enough, This. Is. It.

This game is like my blank canvas, only me to decide what i do and what i dont do and the sudden life or death situations that happen in this game are all gob smacking realistic. i cannot even fathom how great this game is. its in depth analysis on the weaponary is intriguing at the least. the realistic survival scenario is just way to much to take on board as a young adult and i feel as if it is just too real all the time. Over my time of playing this game i can safely say.



































screw sneks

review: This game is an "Early Access" disaster! Nowadays "Down To One" is an abandoned attempt to create an enjoyable battle royal multiplayer shooter. It is poorly optimized, which was the reason I played it no longer when there was a little bunch of players around. Now the players are gone, there aren't servers online and the developer ... - but who cares? ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198126213050', 'num_games_owned': 2930, 'num_reviews': 365, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1461057011}
review:
よく見るサバイバルオープンワールド。
例に倣ってクラフト要素やのどの渇き、腹の減り等もありますが、建築要素は無かったはずです。
「はず」と言うのも、ゲーム自体が重すぎるのか、不具合なのか、Pingが高すぎるせいなのかは分かりませんが、当時は鯖にも入れずまともに遊べなかったです。
ゲーム起動し、キャラクター作成、鯖を選択までは良いんですが、その先に進まないことが殆どです。

仮に入ってリスポーンしたとしても、周りに殆どオブジェクトがないので他作品よりサバイバルできないです。
オープンワールドとしてもそうですが、オブジェクトが無さ過ぎるので、広過ぎるのか、せまいのかまでもよく分かりませんでした。

まともに遊んで、ゲーム内容が浅い等の評価を出来たらよかったんですが、それ以前の話だったので割かし残念でした。
いつかまともにプレイできる日がやってくると良いのですが・・・・。

review:
Bon bon bon... passez votre chemin!
Sur le principe, ça avait l'air plutôt cool.
En réalité beaucoup moins.
Pour 0.60 Euros et ce malgré les critiques défavorables, je m'étais dis:" soyons ouvert d'esprit et testons."
Et ben il en faut de l'ouverture d'esprit... Impossible de rejoindre une game.... Aucun serveur dispo...
Je ne peux même pas vous dire à quoi ressemble ce jeu. Le pire c'est que je ne peux même pas le quitter car le bouton est buggé...

author: {'steamid': '76561198162396051', 'num_games_owned': 287, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1489104133}
review: Thought id review this game after the hype died, although it died a long time ago, i must say, this game is fucking garbage, clunky, unoptimized, most unoriginal idea ever, nothing new to the table AT ALL. I looked at some of the Curators who gave this game a good review, there was one for 10/10, fuck off. These curators have to be the worst in history, fucking sellouts, absoloute jokes, look at the curators, dont follow them, waste of time. Anyway back to the game, its wank, BUT i love it. The reason i love it, is if you get some friends together to play this game, its possibly the most hillarious thing ever, i have not laughed so hard in my life playing this game. 79 Pence is a joke if you have no one to play this with, play this with friends and its priceless, thumbs up just for pure hillarity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111917201', 'num_games_owned': 32, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1458152029}
review: Dobra... Miałem do wyboru - Sprite/Coca-Cola/Fanta, albo dopłacić 4 grosze (!!!!) (4 grosze więcej od puszki napoju, i to małej) i mieć grę - FPS-a na dodatek. I to o snajperach! Jestem amatorem słabych i niedocenionych gier. Ale to jest, k****, kompletna k**** porażka. No bez jaj, panowie. Jak można zrobić taki syf? Pograłem 20 min i już mnie bierze na wymioty. Byłem gotowy na kaszanę, ale to co zobaczyłem, przerosło moje oczekiwania. Myślałem, że chociaż sobie postrzelam do latających ludków. GRA NIE ZALICZA TRAFIEŃ. Gram trochę w Counter Strike'a i umiem celować. Strzelam headshota. Drugi raz. Trzeci. Temu samemu osobnikowi. Lecę dalej. I co? I g**no. Dopiero strzał w korpus coś robi. Grafika? Jaka k**** grafika? Co to jest? Grafika? Hmmm... Grał ktoś w Dead Triggera na Androidzie? Tak, na telefoniku? Nie próbujcie nawet porównywać tych dwóch produktów. Modele postaci żywcem wyjęte z produkcji Pixara o chodzących zabawkach. Żal mi d*** ściska po prostu. Świetne, ale to świetne animacje i wrogowie podbiegający 10 kroków, by następnie stanąć, i pruć do ciebie z karabinu czy innego gó****** animowanego ścierwa. Ho ho ho! Dubbing! Polska gra, nie ma polskich napisów, nic dodać nic ująć. Jedziemy dalej, w końcu angielski powinien znać każdy (ja się do tej grupy zaliczam), i to dobrze (może i bardzo dobrze). Nie wiem, kto zatrudniał osoby podkładające głos, ale zasługuje on na poniżenie. Tak samo zresztą jak osoba, która głosu udziela. Uszy po prostu krwawią od tandety. Nabuzowany brzydki typek pie**** jakieś durne teksty o ratowaniu d*** i whisky. ARABOWIE! Nie wiem, czy ktoś w polskiej ekipie tworzącej słyszał język arabski. Ule ule ulge ulo ulo lulo gulbo gul gul gul. Za każdym razem, gdy piep***** arab wyskoczy i zacznie napiep**** do ciebie ze wszystkiego, co ma pod ręką. Czara goryczy została przelana, gdy zabijając przeciwnika, obok niego zespawnował się jego kolega. Przebiegł 10 kroków i zaczął napie******. Zaskoczenie! Genialne animacje wchodzenia po drabinie czy interakcji z przedmiotami. Rozumiem, że gra kierowana jest do amatorów wizyt w kiosku, ale DLACZEGOOOOOOO?????????????????????? Polecam grę każdemu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053291116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1453015991}
review: Довольно интересная бродилка на выживание. На большой карте хаотично рабрасывает игроков, где они могут находить лут (оружие, воду, еду и лекарство). Во время игры стоит обращать внимания на вертолет, с которого сбрасывают более хороший дроп в виде оружия. Смысл игры- остаться на карте последним, убивая других игроков. Минусы игры в её не доработке- графика оставляет желать лучшего, баги... Но вечером убить время самое то

review:
Зашел в игру и она поразила меня сразу своим минифутбольным полем и мячом по колено!)
Особенно эти ворота, как будто бухой завхоз вместе с трудовиком сделали их на спор между собой)
И да, меня очень порадовали двери, с которыми нельзя никак взаимодействовать. О-о-о, а какая же физика там, будь бы жив А. Энштейн, он наверняка бы аплодировал стоя!) Вобщем игра стоит того, особенно когда посмотришь трейлер. Качай, советую!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198120926330', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1485448174}
review:
Зашел в игру, оценил загон и футбольный мяч с которым нельзя интерактировать.

Спустя 10 минут зашел первый и последний из игроков которого я видел, написал мне hi

Ответил ему тем же, но не сменил язык и написал рш

После 5 минут бессмысленного набивания друг другу морды, оценил корявость анимации

Нашел куст 

Начал бегать вокруг куста пытаясь себя развлечь

Мой соперник по несчастью решил меня поддержать

Вскоре куст наскучил

Нашел карту, начал разглядывать

Чуть позже оглянулся и понял, что из соперников остался только куст

Вышел из игры

Понял что куст теперь одинок

Сел в угол, обхватил колени

Смеюсь..

10 одиноких кустов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198179736755', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1479057822}
review:
Девочки, я не пойму, че вы плачите? Игра продавалась по 15 рублей за килограмм, даже если брать по 29 без скидки-вы реально думаете что игра не должна уступать каким ни будь Каловдути?
Игру делает один человек, не пять, не десять а один! Он за два месяца выпустил больше обновлений для игры чем разработчики H1Z1 и DayZ за год, вместе взятые!!! Что вы плачите как 15-ние девочки? Карточки стоят не по 1.5 рубля, а по 5-7 рублей. Хотите нормальные игры? Готовьтесь отдать как минимум 300 рублей.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026628872', 'num_games_owned': 1138, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 1113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1058, 'last_played': 1532827242}
review:
It's just a down and dirty Battle Royale, what's there not to like? It's just a shame there is never anyone playing.

Pros
Pretty damn fun game when there's people to play it.
The weapons are pretty diverse in how they handle.
The talents make it so there's quite a few different ways to get a major or slight advantage over enemies.
It's like playing a survival game and a Battle Royale game at the same time.

Cons
The menu glitches out often.
When you choose to purchase a talent it doesn't let you select it until you restart the game, because of this you can purchase the same talent multiple times and waste your money.
No one plays the game.
Snakes are super loud and give away your position constantly.
The flies and their noise that occur on corpses doesn't happen when you play dead so it's an obvious giveaway, not necessarily a bad thing but kind of annoying when playing against people who know the game, so more of a personal gripe.

this is just not even a game. unless you have four friends who can all play this game its just useless. im a little shocked that this even got onto steam.

third. i spent almost 3 dollars on this and 3 DOLLARS isnt even cheap enough for this game.
1/10 do not buy, unless updated and fixed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017943697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1442443203}
review:
Tässä tapauksessa on kustu asiakkaan päälle koko lastin edestä. EA-tilassa pelin ostaneita hemmoteltiin kymmenen euron pelillä, joka on ollut kuollut koko elinkaarensa ajan. Serverillä ei pelaajia ollut ja miksi olisi, kun pasianssikin tuotti enemmän iloa. Jossain vaiheessa kehittäjältä taisi loppua huumori kesken ja julkaisi pelin kaikkineen bugeineen ja uudeksi hintalapuksi muodostui 1 euro. Halvaltahan tuo kuulostaa, mutta lupaan sulle että paljon lämpimämmän muiston sulle tarjoaa eurolla vaikka juustohampurilainen.

Antakaa peukkua tai jotain ettei kukaan vahingossa osta tätä peliä! Oikeasti!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021050825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1493691589}
review:
So this randomly appeared in my libary. Now i have wanted this game for actual a small while. After launching it i can now, for the first time want my money back for a game i got for free. I dont even know how thats possible but i really want my 0.00$ back.

Kiddking aside this game is just, NO. I mean i dont have much room to talk due to me never actually being a match but thats kinda the problem. There are no servers or finding servers is broken. So yea thats a big problem... Then I go to quit but the actual quit button is just a decal. It does not even work. So yea thats kinda annoying. I could see this game maybe once had a vision and also just to see more bugs I clicked "report a bug". I type a somewhat lengthy bug report of the quit button and various other thins that were just off, then I go to send it and the button is also a decal. There was no way to send the bug report due to the bug report sending system being bugged. So i have to manually close it but that was even troublesome. TBH this game really reminds me of Ark (at early acesses launch) except if you took everything out but the buggy menu. So this game i must admit did provide some enjoyment but well not the right kind. If anyone does actually get into a game please tell me of the amazing bugs that will surely come.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119546722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1490117516}
review:
The game really does live up to it's name, as it seems no one else touches this cheap, but still intresting looking ARMA like shooter. I mean fo 79p in the UK, that's pretty a good bagin for a game but the community is as joked above, Down to One.

I'd like to see this get some more attention, if the devs still care for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198220727376', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1507913444}
review:
Не понимаю,почему все так унижают эту игру,ведь она довольно неплохая(тем более за 29 руб.).Конечо,есть здесь и плюсы и минусы:
Плюсы:
+ Недорого
+ Графика(для игры за 29 рублей графика очень даже неплохая)
+ Интересно бегать по карте
+ Есть возможность прокачивания персонажа(перки) и даже система рангов!(лол))
+ Музон ниче так))
Минусы:
- Лаги.Да,они здесь встречаются довольно часто,но,еще раз напомню,что эта игра за 29,а не за 499 руб.!К тому же(я надеюсь) их скоро испраят
- Баги.Сижу я такой на смотровой вышке,и просто проседаю под нее,страшно)).Но баги-тоже дело времени,и,скорее всего,их пофиксят
- Всего 1 карта(ненадолго,кончено же)
- Серваки полупустые.Но с другой стороны,не такие уж и пустые (на данный момент 2 сервака с 22-27 из 45 человек,да еще пара-тройка с 4-7)
Плюсов больше,к тому же большинство недостатков-временные(игре нет и недели).А по скидке,с коллекционными карточками,считайте,что купили её за 2-3 рубля(если продадите карточки)

Девочки, я не пойму, че вы плачите? Игра продавалась по 15 рублей за килограмм, даже если брать по 29 без скидки-вы реально думаете что игра не должна уступать каким ни будь Каловдути?
Игру делает один человек, не пять, не десять а один! Он за два месяца выпустил больше обновлений для игры чем разработчики H1Z1 и DayZ за год, вместе взятые!!! Что вы плачите как 15-ние девочки? Карточки стоят не по 1.5 рубля, а по 5-7 рублей. Хотите нормальные игры? Готовьтесь отдать как минимум 300 рублей.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136157326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1479587107}
review:
Why?.......Oh why do you make me write a bad review? I'm a nice guy and rarely do I see or say negative things. This game? This game should still be in Early Access. It needs a hell of a lot of work. 
The concept was cool. Battle Royal type deal. Scavenge for weapons and food. Kill the competition. 
Problem is there is no competition. The one time I did manage to get in a match. I killed a guy and it crashes.
 There hasn't been any activity with this game since I bought it. No updates, nothing.
Here I bought a 4 pack of this game to give to my friends but I'm afraid to.

If this game somehow gets updates and becomes playable? I'll gladly change my review. 
In the meantime. My notion is it's abandoned. The devs have aborted this project. Leaving a sick and twisted piece of software to die on its own. Thumbed down to oblivion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018629981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1211, 'last_played': 1688253171}
review:
THIS GAME IS AWESOME, BUT NEEDS MORE UPDATES!

WHY GUYS? 
Down To One is a promising battle royale game, but it needs urgent new updates, before is too late! 

This is a highly bugged game and incomplete... But...
This game is an indie game, and for an indie team this is a big work!
The gameplay works well, is solid, the game is very funny, but it needs a lot of improvements and some additions.
The variety of weapons is very good, and the foods, survival, system is good too (better than H1Z1)!
A lot of bugs (some are serious) needs to be fixed because the gameplay and fun is seriously compromise. 

FOR THE DEVELOPERS:
I'm a developer too, I can understand the sorrow for an empty game and for a lot of negative reviews, but this is your fault.
Down To One is promising, the gameplay is solid, all bugs and gameplay mechanics can be and needs to be fixed and improving a lot, before release other projects, because other future projects sales will be damaged compromised for this conduct.
Please do not abandon this project, because it is solid and needs only finishing touches. This is an indie project i can understand!  
The players are angry because they feel abandoned without news of game developments..


FOR SAVE THE GAME FROM THE ABYSS AND REGAIN THE PLAYERS CONFIDENCE IS NEEDED:

     1) Return to Early Access, the game isn't finished!
     2) Update Unity 5.4 beta in 5.4.1 Stable, many crashes!
     3) Write news to explain the development state of the game (regular news)
     4) Updates every month (1.3, 1.4, 1.5...)
     5) Fixed various serious bugs as:
              5.1) Players can see through walls
              5.2) Transition from walking, running etc.. needs to be very quick
              5.3) The animations and the walking is too slow, it needs more balance
              5.4) Some wrong collider can block you from walking
              5.5) The "waiting arena" is boring, enlarge it and make more aesthetic objects
              5.6) Main menu buttons not respond well at mouse click
              5.7) Set Static Server list to default if this is to set every time
              5.8) The server list doesn't show number of player and ping (?/42, ?)  
              5.9) Exit Game button doesn't work
              5.10) Some video options (as shadow quality) miss its settings 
     
      6) Features needed for a modern and fun Battle Royale game:
              6.1) Player/weapons customization skin/accessories with a 3d model preview
              6.2) The Skill needs to be reworked
              6.3) After death you can give some skin/player customizations rewards, based on match rating
              6.4) Team play, to play better with friends
              6.5) Add more weapons (or same weapons but with different scopes/accessories)
              6.6) Add accessories for weapons (scope, silencer etc..)
              6.7) Rework and Enlarge the map
              6.8) Armors and helms to find
              6.9) backpack for increase items slots (start with only 3, 4 ,5)
              6.10) Add some vehicles (quad, motocycles, jeep?)
              6.11) 2 start match spawn:  1) random, 2) parachute
              6.12) Add more sounds, enviroment, player, weapons
              6.13) Add a portable map (optional with dome system) without player position and dome
              6.14) Planes Bombing Raid
              6.15) The Graphics and Textures need improvements (some are good, other are very bad)
              6.16) The Players Animations need improvements


I trust in you guys, please make one of the best Battle Royale game!
Down To One can become better than H1Z1, the gameplay is more complex and various, only needs some tweaks. 

Let's Develop Now!

author: {'steamid': '76561197997987206', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1546719098}
review:
I really wish I could play this game. I bought a 4-pack with the intent of giving one to my brother, and one to our friend. I still have three in my inventory. I have actually never played a single match. I have tried about six times to play, and tonight there are LITERALLY ZERO SERVERS. The game is 100% dead. No matter the content of a game, if you cannot even play it, for any reason, I cannot recommend it in any way.

Sucks I can't get a refund, seeing how I was sold a game with no players, and no gameplay (if you don't count the main menu, and {empty} server list).

author: {'steamid': '76561198124305948', 'num_games_owned': 711, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1472211680}
review:
Купил эту игру очень давно, и долго не мог понять, что меня могло сподвигнуть на это действие. Потом правда посмотрел историю, что купил за несколько рублей, а карточки я продал, и получил выгоду в 3 раза больше чем потратил. 
Перейдём к главному. Значит захожу я в игру, нахожу несколько серверов, в котором онлайн 1 человек. Ну хорошо, подумал я и решил зайти, мол один побегаю, ну типа как в "Расте". Кароч, попадаю я в какой-то сарай, в центре которого мяч. Бегал, прыгал, и никак не мог выйти. Так и не смог потестить ничего.
И вывод напрашивается сам собой. Раз мультиплеер мёртв, и игра никак не может тебя выпустить никуда, то и игра умирает. 
Рекомендация? Ну в плане срубить 10-15 рублей- пойдет; чтобы поиграть с друзьями по фану, ну так себе; а в соло- игра вообще не возможна.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168721136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1460242127}
review:
es una mierd* necesitan mejorar un monton de cosas, no lo compren, para empezar los servidores vacios y no se puede jugar, va como el culo, y no sirven unos votones como el de salir de un server o algunos otros le tienes que apuntar abajo o arriva del icono, no lo compren aun esperen a que lo mejoren. 
(actualización/correción por la pesima ortografía)
"Es una mierda, necesitan mejorar muchos aspectos.
Para empezar, los servidores estan vacíos por lo tanto hace imposible jugarlo, consume demasiados recursos del pc innecesariamente, no sirven las opciones como: salir del server, opciones gráficas, tabla de jugadores. No es mala la teoria o idea del juego pero en la práctica siento que lo llevan algo mal. no lo compren aún, tal vez más delante si, ya que solucionen sus errores. por le momento se lleva un pulgar abajo, tal vez más delante lo pueda poner hacia arriba."

author: {'steamid': '76561198050272635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1469384669}
review:
Part 1
On the 16th of June, 1904, Stephen Dedalus and Leopold Bloom were both living in Dublin. Both differed from the people about them and walked in isolation among them because each was, according to his capacity, an intellectual adventurer—Dedalus, the poet and philosopher, with a mind full of beautiful images and abstruse speculations and Bloom, the advertisement canvasser, in a more rudimentary fashion. In the evening, Mr. Bloom and Dedalus became involved in the same drunken party and Dedalus was knocked unconscious in a quarrel with a British soldier. Then their kinship was made plain. Bloom felt wistfully that Stephen was all he would have had his own son be and Stephen, who despised his own father—an amiable wastrel—found a sort of spiritual father in this sympathetic Jew, who, mediocre as he was, had at least the dignity of intelligence. Were they not both outlaws to their environment by reason of the fact that they thought and imagined ?

This is the story of Ulysses—an ironic and amusing anecdote without philosophic moral.

Stated in the baldest possible terms, this is the story of Ulysses—an ironic and amusing anecdote without philosophic moral. In describing the novel thus, I have the authority of the author himself, who said to Miss Djuna Barnes, in an interview published in Vanity Fair: “The pity is the public will demand and find a moral in my book—or worse they may take it in some more serious way, and on the honor of a gentleman, there is not one single serious line in it.” The thing that makes Ulysses imposing is, in fact, not the theme but the scale upon which it is developed. It has taken Mr. Joyce seven years to write Ulysses and he has done it in seven hundred and thirty pages which are probably the most completely “written” pages to be seen in any novel since Flaubert. Not only is the anecdote expanded to its fullest possible bulk—there is an elaborate account of nearly everything done or thought by Mr. Bloom from morning to night of the day in question—but you have both the “psychological” method and the Flaubertian method of making the style suit the thing described carried several steps further than they have ever been before, so that, whereas in Flaubert you have merely the words and cadences carefully adapted to convey the specific mood or character without any attempt to identify the narrative with the stream of consciousness of the person described, and in Henry James merely the exploration of the stream of consciousness with only one vocabulary and cadence for the whole cast of moods and characters, in Joyce you have not only life from the outside described with Flaubertian virtuosity but also the consciousness of each of the characters and of each of the character’s moods made to speak in the idiom proper to it, the language it uses to itself. If Flaubert taught de Maupassant to find the adjective which would distinguish a given hackney-cab from every other hackney-cab in the world, James Joyce has prescribed that one must find the dialect which would distinguish the thoughts of a given Dubliner from those of every other Dubliner. So we have the thoughts of Mr. Bloom presented in a rapid staccato notation continually jetting out in all directions in little ideas within ideas with the flexibility and complexity of an alert and nimble mind; Mrs. Bloom’s in a long rhythmic brogue like the swell of some profound sea; Father Conmee’s in precise prose, perfectly colorless and orderly; Stephen Dedalus’s in a kaleidoscope of bright images and fragments of things remembered from books; and Gerty-Nausicaa’s half in school girl colloquialisms and half in the language of the cheap romances which have given their color to her mind. And these voices are used to record all the eddies and stagnancies of thought; though exercising a severe selection which makes the book a technical triumph, Mr. Joyce manages to give the effect of unedited human minds, drifting aimlessly along from one triviality to another, confused and diverted by memory, by sensation and by inhibition. It is, in short, perhaps the most faithful X-ray ever taken of the ordinary human consciousness.

It is, in short, perhaps the most faithful X-ray ever taken of the ordinary human consciousness.
And as a result of this enormous scale and this microscopic fidelity the chief characters in Ulysses take on heroic proportions. Each one is a room, a house, a city in which the reader can move around. The inside of each one of them is a novel in itself. You stand within a world infinitely populated with the swarming life of experience. Stephen Dedalus, in his scornful pride, rears his brow as a sort of Lucifer; poor Bloom, with his generous impulses and his attempts to understand and master life, is the epic symbol of reasoning man, humiliated and ridiculous, yet extricating himself by cunning from the spirits which seek to destroy him; and Mrs. Bloom, with her terrific force of mingled amorous and maternal affection, with her roots in the dirt of the earth and her joyous flowering in beauty, is the gigantic image of the earth itself from which both Dedalus and Bloom have sprung and which sounds a deep foundation to the whole drama like the ground-tone at the beginning of The Rhine-Gold. I cannot agree with Mr. Arnold Bennett that James Joyce “has a colossal ‘down’ on humanity.” I feel that Mr. Bennett has really been shocked because Mr. Joyce has told the whole truth. Fundamentally Ulysses is not at all like Bouvard et Pécuchet (as some people have tried to pretend). Flaubert says in effect that he will prove to you that humanity is mean by enumerating all the ignobilities of which it has ever been capable. But Joyce, including all the ignobilities, makes his bourgeois figures command our sympathy and respect by letting us see in them the throes of the human mind straining always to perpetuate and perfect itself and of the body always laboring and throbbing to throw up some beauty from its darkness.

Nonetheless, there are some valid criticisms to be brought against Ulysses. It seems to me great rather for the things that are in it than for its success as a whole. It is almost as if in distending the story to ten times its natural size he had finally managed to burst it and leave it partially deflated. There must be something wrong with a design which involves so much that is dull—and I doubt whether anyone will defend parts of Ulysses against the charge of extreme dullness. In the first place, it is evidently not enough to have invented three tremendous characters (with any quantity of lesser ones); in order to produce an effective book they must be made to do something interesting. Now in precisely what is the interest of Ulysses supposed to consist? In the spiritual relationship between Dedalus and Bloom? But too little is done with this. When it is finally realized there is one poignant moment, then a vast tract of anticlimax. This single situation in itself could hardly justify the previous presentation of everything else that has happened to Bloom before on the same day. No, the major theme of the book is to he found in its parallel with the Odyssey: Bloom is a sort of modern Ulysses—with Dedalus as Telemachus—and the scheme and proportions of the novel must be made to correspond to those of the epic. It is these and not the inherent necessities of the subject which have dictated the size and shape of Ulysses. You have, for example, the events of Mr. Bloom’s day narrated at such unconscionable length and the account of Stephen’s synchronous adventures confined almost entirely to the first three chapters because it is only the early books of the Odyssey which are concerned with Telemachus and thereafter the first half of the poem is devoted to the wanderings of Ulysses.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151879155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1401, 'last_played': 1589038359}
review: У игры есть много минусов, но самый жирный минус это то, что разработчик вкинул игру в стим очень сырой. У игры есть не плохой потенциал и поначалу, когда она только появилась я потрати целый день залипая в нее. Потом посоветовал ее своему другу и оказал что играть в нее вдвоем куда интереснее и угарнее. Игра очень неплохая альтернатива играм в жанре выживания, в особенности нравиться то что ты не особо переживаешь о потери лута, потерял и хрен с ним, вышел из матча и зашел в другой. Ввообщем игра достоина внимания и стоит дешего, так что ставлю положительный отзыв.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993651907', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1565470284}
review:
i got the game for free so i feel really sorry for the person who buyed it for me and himself in hope to play it with me.

i FOUND a server with 3 people in it and loading took decent time even tho i was not sure did game just freeze or not,  i was willing to give this game a shot... heh... a shot, BECAUSE ALL I FOUND WAS A PILE OF FOOD  AND SOME BACKAGES WHAT WERE ACTUALLY BANDAGES.

when i finally found a knife, i felt like a king but soon i heard gun shots landing on the walls while i was inside, i saw nobody anyhow who would have done that.... oh and btw... ladders are a joke and how i solved it was just by spam jump up over the roof. 

the items are half way glitched inside ground, i was not able pick up pistol so i had to drop my knife in order to do that. while opening drawers i realised items are stuck back part of them so it's pain in ass to try get them from there... i was sniped by a pistol short after that and that is all.

i don't know who tough making pistols super accurate and long ranged weapons but yeah... hey at least i found way to glitch trough big red backgage to get item from inside it but all i got was a radio what did nothing for me more than took room from inventory. 

2/10 for trying at least little bit but not enough, don't buy the game as a even joke for someone because you just support the makers or maker... i don't fucking care.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203169966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4, 'last_played': 1467203780}
review:
Down To One to gra opustoszała z graczy. Serwerów jest zwykle 3 do 4 i w tylko w 2 z nich znajduje się 1 do 3 graczy, którzy i tak po 2 min. oczekiwania opuszczają serwer (a sprawdzałem w różnych porach dnia).
Zmarnowałem przy tej grze 40 min. i przez cały ten czas nie zagrałem ani jednego meczu tylko biłem się w poczekalniach z innym/i graczem/ami.
Co ciekawe w moim przypadku wyjść z gry dało się jedynie poprzez wyłączenie komputera.
Już nie będę wspominał o grafice i bugach, które zdążyłem zauważyć jedynie w poczekalni.
Teraz nie kupiłbym tej gry nawet za ten 1 euro.

review: зашёл, две минуты ждал автообновления серверов, потом обновил сам, нашёл сервер на котором было три человека, зашел, два долбоёба пинали мяч, третий был поляк и пытался меня отпиздить так ака я написал два слова на русском. потом вылетело, лобби выглядит как говно, карты я не видел. меню тоже говно, потенциала и особой идеи у игры нет. 3 агрессивных поляка из 10 возможныхх. author: {'steamid': '76561198135650516', 'num_games_owned': 353, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1638762672}
review:
My friend gifted this to me and I have to say this game is actually pretty good and has a lot of potential if more people played on the servers. When  you can get enought people on a server its super fun. Battle Royale is really good in this game. Deathmatch is also good in this game. I am now going to put a Pros and Cons list.

Pros:                                             
Decent Graphics                            
Battle Royale                                 
Deathmatch                                   
Fun 
A lot of perks for your character
Good Framerate (for me at least and I have a horrible pc)
Variety of Melee weapons and guns
You can play soccer (Football everywhere else)

Cons:
 Quit Button Doesn't work
 Most of the time servers are empty
 Bugs

That is all I can think of,But as you can see there are a lot more Pros than Cons.
I say buy the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996890045', 'num_games_owned': 3060, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1466413574}
review:
The game Down To One could be ok, but I wouldn't know - as normally there is no-one in any of the servers available (and there are very few of those).

Down To One is well named, as the number of players in just about every server I've joined is down to one (namely, me).

Amazingly, today - for the first time ever - I found someone else in a server.
Mind you, it was a rubbish map, about the size of a large lounge room, with a soccer ball on the ground - I guess that you are supposed to play soccer rather than have a shooting game. The map was listed, in the "Environment" column of the server list, as "Middle-East". It was pathetic. Unless it is a pre-match area, but I wouldn't know - because I have never found enough people in a server to play a game.
Another person joined the server shortly afterwards, but he quit after about one minute (or less) - I don't blame him.
I reloaded the game to check something for this review. The server list said that there were three players in one server, but it was actually empty; I think it was the server I was in previously. This is typical; with one exception (noted above), whenever the server list has said someone is in a game, and I join, it's empty.

By the way, you have to change your settings in the game's loading box; most settings cannot be changed after the game is loaded (although some settings can be changed in-game).
The exit button on the start screen doesn't work (I have to Ctrl-Alt-Delete to get out of the game).
So, that's not too crash hot (no pun intended).

The servers are empty. The game is dead.
I cannot recommend a game which is deceased.

review:
had high hopes for this game ... sadly enough the longer i kept the game and the more i tried, the more disappointed i got...

the game itself is a great idea; but when there is no one to play with, and the occasional play is just a 1V1 then the game is dull and not fun at all... the marketing department for this game made some big errors ...

also about the pricing; some people paid 15 on greenlight, others paid 1 after the greenlight period; that's not fair; that's just jackpotting the greenlightsers. Also, a few months ago the game was in a bundle sale for even less money...

author: {'steamid': '76561198019147628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1846, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1791, 'last_played': 1536370418}
review:
I have owned this game for years now, bought it long before I knew about ARMA, let alone the Battlegrounds mod.  

This is clearly a single man project, and the creator is still active.  I believe this is simply a misguided concept, not a malicious cash grab.  After all this time the developer is still keeping us updated on their work and, you know, actually working on it.  If it were anything else they would have deserted it like so many others.

In the short amount of time I got to actually play the game, I managed to gather a few positives.  I like the handling and controls, firing has an appropriate weight behind it.  You have limited inventory space, even compared to other games in the genre.  Finding ammo for the gun you have is fortunate.  You can starve, or dehydrate, or get bit by a snake which makes camping a little more difficult.  While the playable zone shrinks it's not to the same harsh extent as in PUBG, so if you get screwed by it, you really screwed yourself.  You can choose between random spawns or the normal mode where you all spawn in a central hud.  There's also a pure deathmatch mode which is actually quite fun. You can climb things you should be able to climb.

There isn't much else to say that shouldn't be apparent.  It's sloppy.  Extremely difficult to actually play with other people due to the minuscule player population.  I know, I've been trying.

The fact is it's playable and less than a buck.  One day this will be a diamond, we just have to ignore how rough it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150243715', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1473665938}
review:
TERRIBILE? NO...PEGGIO!:

In questa recensione non posso descrivervi più di tanto il gameplay, poichè sul sistema da me testato il gioco girava davvero male.

OTTIMIZZAZIONE:
Una delle peggiori che io abbia mai visto, parliamo di circa 24FPS in 1440x900 a qualità minima (Very low) con una modesta GT730 con 2GB di GDDR3 e con tanto di OC a +300MHz di Core Clock e Memory Clock, accompagnata da 8GB di RAM DDR3 a 1600MHz ed un FX-8370e a 4.3GHz (Ok, è vero che la scheda non è gran che ma se pensiamo che GTA V su questa scheda va con FXAA attivo, 1440x900 e qualità grafica High-Very High + X2 MSAA sulle reflection a 32-43FPS, si può benissimo intuire il pessimo lavoro che c'è dietro a questo videogame)
Beh, pessima ottimizzazione, ma buona grafica? NO! Grafica rudimentale, a mio parere si può paragonare al comparto grafico (ma forse ha qualcosa in meno) del Free-To-Play "Warface" (che a Grafica Media, Raggiunge la qualità ULTRA di questo titolo con un frame di tanto maggiore), 
Un qualcosa che mi ha fatto strocere ancor più il naso? La descrizione del gioco!:
"Built For Performance: With support for 4K resolution, 64bit-only systems and DX11, your hardware won't get bored easily." 
Cioe, non solo l'ottimizzazione fà davvero pena, avete il coraggio di scrivere che c'è un ottimizzazione perfetta e che l'hardware non verrà messo facilmente in difficoltà?

GAMEPLAY:
Il GAMEPLAY è noioso e ripetitivo, semplicemente, null'altro d'aggiungere,e come se non bastasse ha parecchi BUG, il server crasha veramente spesso, sembra un gioco non finito ed inoltre ci vuole tanto, anzi, TROPPO tempo per respawnare!

PREZZO:
Non vale quei 0.99 centesimi, piuttosto sui dei siti web di key, trovate CAPOLAVORI come "A Story about my Uncle" a 0.83 centesimi!

IL VOTO?! 3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198213056781', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1555364397}
review:
Дам этой игре 7/10 так как:
Игра с потенциалом, но пока что не сильно захватывает. Сервера Европы в основном пустуют, корявые анимации, лаги.
-Плюсы.
1)Цена
2)Анимации открывания дверей, поедания, и т.д. (Мелочь, а приятно)
3)Кол-во вещей
-Минусы.
1)Кол-во разработчиков. Маловато.
2)Анимации движения, корявые.
3)Серверная часть хромает, но с каждым обновление всё лучше и лучше.
Вполне себе годно (7/10).Удачки...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025135104', 'num_games_owned': 3459, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 489, 'last_played': 1461972666}
review:
Ni siquiera como un chiste el juego es adecuado. Además de los múltiples errores, no hay nadie con quién jugar. Uno pensaría: bueno, puedo jugar para grabar videos chistosos y subirlos a YouTube. No. Ni eso. Desde que un juego tiene problemas con la pantalla de opciones sabes que has pisado caca en el desierto. Aléjense de esta madre. No la compren.

* Reseña escrita completa: http://www.agustinfest.com/2016/05/down-to-one-cero-es-uno-y-uno-es-cero/

* Reseña en video: http://wp.me/p4vhS-15U

author: {'steamid': '76561198060277415', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 632, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1461303727}
review:
Down To One is a game that I can't recommend because:
- it is boring
- it is terribly optimized
- it has issues
- the servers are crashing
- the respawn takes really too much
- it looks more like a unfinished game
- the only good reason to install this game is for the trading cards

author: {'steamid': '76561197999591258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1452300740}
review:
I go into a game and it becomes instant downgraded COD deathmatch. This game is complete ass not to mention 0 population. I mean it is 99 cents and I got for 29 cents. For the price of the game, you're not going to get much out of it. 
RATINGS
Graphics - 5/10
Outdated and poor

Gameplay - 3/10
Very frustrating and stupid to learn controls on how to pick up and throw weapons away
Awkward gun-play

Overall - 4/10
I would give 1/10 other than the fact is 1 dollar
The game feels like it is in devolpment and we are the testers. But we pay for it. It's like "Come test our new great software! We just finished the most basic parts of it! Pay a dollar to try some really crappy and useless software!"

I know what Early Access is, but the game feels like it is YEARS off of being a decent game. The devs in my opinion are great, they update and hold tournaments to encourage their game, but it doesn't make up for all of these cons I have talked about. 

Other games are almost identical and 100 times better like h1z1(19.99, 9.99 on sale USD) and CSGO(14.99, 7.49 on sale USD)

I would only buy if I was like a 10 year old kid who didn't get steam money and wanted a decent game to spend on that didn't cost that much money but was like a arena-survival game. 

IF ANYBODY LIKES THIS GAME OR IS A DEV OF THIS GAME, I KNOW YOUR GAME IS PROBABLY YOUR FIRST, BUT I AM JUST GIVING AN HONEST REVIEW.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182203394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1460893571}

This game sucks
Also support page is down for this game so i cant refund this garbage.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217374264', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1460492257}
review:
И так чуваки,вы зашли на страницу с игрой Down to One,мы видим прекрасные скриншоты,нам поесняют что тут мы будем выживать прям как в Dayz,у нас много возможностей и неплохая графа-и все это за 29 рублей.
Да,графика тут неплохая.Но как у меня бомбануло когда я узнал что в эту игру играть НЕЛЬЗЯ!
В чем дело,спросите вы.Все просто!Мы заходим на серв и появляимся в какомто ангаре где есть мяч и ворота,и куча окон!Я не понял что мне делать,начал ломать,пинать мяч,пытатся выбраться с этого ангара.Но потом до меня дошло,что надо ждать пока наберется 16 человек...16 ЧЕЛОВЕК В ИГРЕ ЗА 29 РУБЛЕЙ???ТАМ НИЗКИЙ ОНЛАЙН И НА ИГРУ НАПЛЕВАЛИ!Ну ладно,хрен с онлайном,но тут просто УЖАСНАЯ оптимизация!Крч игра фиговая.
+Графика
-Оптимизация
-Тупой интерфейс
-Тупые сервера

author: {'steamid': '76561198023598474', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1486812492}
review:
Очень противоречивая вещица... Никогда раньше с таким не сталкивался. Игра настолько выбешивает косяками, причем местами банальными и решаемыми парой цифр в скрипте, что хочется удалить без раздумий под возмущенный возглас: "Ну как можно такое делать?!". Однако при этом она дает настолько интересную атмосферу и орригинальный геймплей что рука не поднимается на кнопку "удалить", а тянется к кнопке запуска. ))
Игра с багами и про инвалидов с ДЦП одетых в военную форму. Разработчики, ну серьезно. Ну возьмите палку в руки на манер автомата и пробегитесь пару метров. Бог с ней с топорной анимацией. Понятно что она не на живых актерах делается  и потому это процесс крайне сложный, но ведь скорость движения можно сделать адекватной. Вы попали на полигон где вам в затылок в любой момент может кусок свинца прилететь, неужели в такой ситуации вы будете прогулочным шагом по полю гулять? (Про боковое движение вообще молчу) Да, да, именно прогулочным шагом ибо при нажатии кнопки "бег" персонаж двигается так медленно что хочется ему кусок каленого железа приложить к одному месту или ознакомится с медицинской картой чтобы понять чем именно он болен. А ведь тут даже не нужно ничего изобретать. Бег, присяд и шаг - функции которые еще лет 20 назад были в CS 1.6 и там почему-то не хотелось материться на своего персонажа. 
В остальном конечно есть и другие проблемы. Например уродливые деформации моделей в момент смерти, взгляд внутрь стен, периодические застревания в проходах, опять же слишком медлительные анимации действий с оружием и предметами... Но чем-то эта игра всё же непередаваемо отличается от всего что я видел. И потому рекомендую попробовать, но только из надежды когда-нибудь увидеть доделанный вариант не конфликтующий с основами логики.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287001332', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1457022554}
review: Ну чтож начнем. Гуляя по набережной стима, разглядывая местные просторы, наткнулся на довольно дешевенькую игрушку. Ну конечно заранее просмотрев наитереснейший клипак от самих производителей зацепился за Down To One. Ну что думаю простенькая интересная и дешевая, почему бы не взять. Сглупил, взял. Дальше сюжет развился куда интереснее чем я предпологал. Получил три подарка, (до сих пор не знаю куда деть), загрузил, зашел на сервер( на едиственный сервер), ждал полчаса, пиная фубольный мяч. Вуаля, появился перс, который по началу вел себя спокойной, но потом видимо, что то пошло не так. Нервы, сами понимаете, начал он меня дубасить и площадка ожидания превратилась в кровавый ринг 2-х бесмертных игроков. Победила дружба. Но поиграть так и не смогла так как, что бы в нее сыграть нужно 15 друзей в стиме, к великому сожалению я не нажил и одного. А ждать, чтобы появилось нужное количество, персов для игры, это все равно что искать крота который поет. Вот так вот. 1 поющий крот из 10. Когда все улучшиться и в игруху можно будет поиграть хоть в двоем, дам больше кротов. Спасибо за внимание.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126863979', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1463840865}

author: {'steamid': '76561198043609914', 'num_games_owned': 3556, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1684970377}
review:
Down To One is a military survival game where 42 players battle it to become the final person alive.

This game is a massive disappointment. I wanted to like this game a lot and without a doubt for a dollar this game is not bad, but it's plagued by so many problems I can't recommend it.

As stated before the game is a 42 player survival game where you go around a map and find supplies so you can become the final person alive.

The massive problem with this game is no one plays it. Now I only tried this game twice and once I waited an hour for a game and got nothing and then a second time I waited another hour and played a game which ended in 4 minutes. 

I had a fun time even though it lasted for that short, but the fact is I didn't want to wait another hour to play another game so it could end in 5 minutes.

The game also has a lot of glitches and bugs which could easily be ironed out by the devs. 

Texture popping, character models glitching, items clipping through items are just some of the issues that plague this game.

I really want to say more about this title, but sadly I can't say a lot. My honest suggestion is either find a community to play with or play with friends otherwise skip this title.

Final Rating:
3/10 - Don't Bother

If you liked this review please consider giving it a thumbs up and if you disliked post in the comments on what you disliked about this review.

For more reviews follow Snort's Review curator page [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/snortsreviews#curation]here[/url] - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!

review: I like this game a lot. However it is pretty badly optimized. I have a crappy cpu but I am able to run games like CSGO and Payday 2 really well and this game seems to cap at 30 fps. It will even dip below 10 fps. Its a great game and a great concept. I feel if it were better optimized, a lot more people would play. And I bought this game for 59 cents so not so much money wasted considering I got a couple good hours out of the game.

review:
I would say yes but nobody is playing it.. Ya know i didn't care that this cost under £1 and felt cheap in every way possible.. It was so bad it was hilarious and it was actually fun..

Maybe do a free weekend or something just to allow people to jump in for a quick game i loved it..

Blowing up on the mines, being chased by snakes it was so much fun. 

Will change to yes when it has players and servers again. Yes the game is a potato but It cost less than £1

All you peoples need to do is click on show static servers, refresh list..

Perk system screen just outright freezes for me :S

author: {'steamid': '76561198135688405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1489856254}
review:
Игра с потенциалом, интересная, но пока что не сильно захватывает. Сервера Европы в основном пустуют, корявые анимации, лаги.
Плюсы
-Цена
-Анимации открывания дверей, поедания,  и т.д. Мелочь, а приятно
-Кол-во вещей. Вполне себе годно, для раннего проекта.
Баллистика. Она тут есть, это точно.
Минусы
-Кол-во разработчиков. Маловато.
Анимации движения, корявые.
-Серверная часть хромает, но с каждым обновление всё лучше и лучше.

review: Egyenlőre még játszhatatlan,rengeteg a bug és nagyon rossz az optimalizálás is. De bízunk benne, hogy majd jönnek a patch-ek. Na és ha soha nem lesz épkézláb játék belőle,na bumm, akkor mi van? Egy euróért egy sajtburgert sem kapsz! Bár ez lenne a legnagyobb veszteség az életben! Buktam én már 40 eurót is egy játékon és mégsem karmoltam össze az arcom az idegességtől, pedig 40 euróért én igen sokat dolgozok. Leírtam és kész, ott van a polton a gyári lemez, mint porfogó, nem haltam bele.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050886763', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1454859097}
review:
If you want to read a first-hand description of this game, then read my review.

So first of all..
This game is ....

S_h.ii.et a.f! Graphics are not the best but it's okay. Bugs. Meh.
H_ard? No way. The aiming is kinda weird but its easy.
I_rritating a.f! I mean the corpses dance and groove like shit. No bugs at all!
T_echnically the Shittiest Solo Forever Alone Game of my life. 

But playing with friends is so fucking funny!
(rich bets + Skill Tree = YOU NEED TONS OF EXP AND MONEY....)

Having fun? The hell yeah. The bugs and the boring Battle Royal concept is suprisingly funny with friends!
Overall it was surprisingly good and the 1$ worth!!!!! 
(Even though at its release date they wanted 50bucks...)
+++++++++++++++
Kappa

author: {'steamid': '76561198086972142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1452644908}
review:
lol no. just no. If you're into entemology, then I would definitely buy this game. It has enough bugs to last you a lifetime trying to load the game menu. If you devote your life to the interesting studies of entemology and make it past the menu and into the actual game, then you should grab a pillow to sit on while you study even more bugs- some sort of wierd "que" system made it so even after an hour of weighting I still had not waited long enough to get my "turn" or something like that.

Scientists, welcome to indoor entemology, where you'll never have to step outside your door to find bugs again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064066770', 'num_games_owned': 608, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1422963594}
review:
[h1]Abandonware[/h1]

Bought 4x pack for 45$ when it was in early access. Then suddenly updates stopped to appear and, after like year or so without news, they pushed it out of alpha, together with dropping price to 1$ (3$ for said pack). Lesson learned, I think - [b]never trust early access open world survival multiplayer indies[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198035779677', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1484581310}
review:
Can be difficult getting enough people to join but you get what you pay for. I'll admit I've only managed to play one game so far but I really like the concept of surviving, raiding and fighting other players at the same time (kind of like DayZ in that aspect). The game doesn't run completly smoothly so you will need to lower the graphics no matter what PC you have but even then it still runs fairly well and decent. For a mere dollar, it really is worth it.

For only a single developer, this is amazing work. Keep up with it

author: {'steamid': '76561198009103233', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1452723202}
review:
EPIC FANTASY REBORN 
The next chapter in the highly anticipated Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the makers of the 2006 and 2008 Games of the Year, Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose. 

LIVE ANOTHER LIFE, IN ANOTHER WORLD 
Play any type of character you can imagine, and do whatever you want; the legendary freedom of choice, storytelling, and adventure of The Elder Scrolls is realized like never before. 

ALL NEW GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY ENGINE 
Skyrim’s new game engine brings to life a complete virtual world with rolling clouds, rugged mountains, bustling cities, lush fields, and ancient dungeons. 

YOU ARE WHAT YOU PLAY 
Choose from hundreds of weapons, spells, and abilities. The new character system allows you to play any way you want and define yourself through your actions. 

DRAGON RETURN 
Battle ancient dragons like you’ve never seen. As Dragonborn, learn their secrets and harness their power for yourself.
10/10 game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972279050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 18550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13213, 'last_played': 1663283076}
review:
It's a lot of die & retry but then you learn the map & where the good stuff is, then you learn how to use perks in a smart way, then you realize this is a game of patience & definitely not one where you can win a round by going around shooting everyone like Rambo. You will die.
I love the natural terrain cover, crouching behind a small dirt bank & moving along the hill lines is very satisfying. Everything else is pretty much standard battle royale with food management, but it's simple & fair.
Add me if you want someone to invite in a server to start a game

author: {'steamid': '76561198253183271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1455706597}
review:
H1Z1 BRの劣化版。

戦闘形式は武器と糧食を求めてマップを彷徨うバトルロワイアル。
中途半端なサバイバル加減と、PVPを融合させたゲーム。

他のバトルロワイアル違うのが、食糧ゲージがあること。
空腹と水分に気を付けなければあっさり死んでしまう。

メインである武器は種類が豊富だが、弾薬が少ないので注意が必要だ。場合によっては近接武器を使用することも心掛ける必要がある。


マップに散らばっている武器や糧食を集めて最後まで生き残るのが本BRの特徴といえるが、面白いのが敵対MOBがランダムに存在すること。
草むらに隠れていたら蛇に噛み殺されるということもある。この点は今後のアップデートで幅が広がる面白い部分である。
(最後は、ARKのBRのように半透明の壁が迫ってきてセーフゾーンが縮小していく)

サーバーには既に有るサーバーに入る形で、ランダムマッチングではないので注意が必要である。
今後、自分で建てることができるかもしれない。
(キュー待ち・死亡後に観戦することが出来る)

前述したように申し訳程度のサバイバル要素のおかげで、ゲームの壮快感はH1Z1と比べると全くない。
結局は中央に集められるので弾薬と糧食の多いプレイヤーが勝てる要素が強い。
糧食さえあれば相手の餓死を待つ戦術もとれるかもしれない。

逆に言えば糧食がなけれ絶対に生き残れない。

他のBRと比べると大味で物足りなさが目立つが値段相応のゲームといえる。


※低スぺPCではプレイが困難なので注意
