author: {'steamid': '76561198083024504', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1454819297}
review:
it took me only one game to realize that this game is not finished. when you need to have an optimization update after the game has been released then you know just how un-polished this game is. I had about 1-10 fps max while playing and the game had my mouse outside the screen. After the optimization update was released i tried to play again but found that there were no servers to play on that i could find (something that could be improved is the server browser) during the game i did play though with low fps, i did not find a single player in a full game and could not find out how to exchange my weapon or pick up any other supplies. i ended up winning this game and then never played it since. 

conlusion: this game is not that good so i bought the 4 pack

author: {'steamid': '76561198024648889', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1454969053}
review:
Ok so my time on the game is 0.2 Hours on Record adn most people won't take my review seriously, but hear me out.

The reason my time is so low, is because the game is so buggy, that I spent my time trying to fix one problem for it to be replaced by another. So here's the full story.

I buy the game in the 4 Pack for me and some friends to have a laugh and play against each other. I download and install it, then I get a problem as soon as I load the game up. The mouse doesn't line up with the UI, well that's strange? So I try again in Windowed mode, problem solved. Crappy that I have to play Windowed, but ok I can deal with it. So I decide to change a few settings from the Default. I click an option that creates a drop down box, Oh? It's not working? I click again, this time the drop down menu appears, but the rest of the UI disappears! Now once I choose an option in the box, the WHOLE UI disappears. Now I can't do anything but close the application and start again. Great now the Menus here and the mouse isn't lining up again. So I repeat the steps, this time switching it to Fullscreen and it works. But now the Options won't change and the UI keeps disappearing.

So after trying numerous times to fix the issue and end up with the same results. I decided to Issue an apology to the 3 Friends I gifted this game too and sat myself in the naughty corner.

Do not buy this game, unless you're 100% sure it's going to work for you. I mean the price isn't bank braking, but I do feel rather bad for gifting this to people and having it stain there Libraries.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020093615', 'num_games_owned': 701, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1479448660}
review:
[h1]Down To One[/h1]

So many people dislike this game saying the graphics are bad there are lots of bugs but you know what I say. 

It’s a Dollar People $0.99 I had a couple hours of enjoyment out of this more than a pack of gum or a snickers bar. 

It’s an E/A Game with current updates. I like its BR vibe and its dorky graphics reminds me of CS1.6/HL1 yes it’s not as advanced as ARMA3 or Rust but hey it’s fun. Try it out for yourselves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159222211', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1819, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1433, 'last_played': 1539646251}
review:
I got this game because I wanted to kill other ppl in a battleroyal hunger games style enviroment.
Here's what happened:

-opens game
-joins server
-spawns in lobby and waits for for about ten literal minutes 
-soldier spawns in front of me with loud clicking noise
-leaves computer to go change pants
-after about 5 more minutes of awkward silence, 4 other guys join
- figures out you have to escape! to 'ready up'
-mysterious black magic breaks all the fences
-guys run out and I run with them, following at a distance
-after ten minutes of doing a yoga jogger run, finds canned pineapple!
-runs into same soldier that scared me with a gun in his hands
-two headshots later, I leave server and game crashes
As you can see, I kept playing. I love this game with all its faults. I even made a facebook page for it, cuz they didnt have one. just check out Down To One. It has tons of bugs, but the devs keep updating and fixing stuff, so it really is getting better!
10/10 would find canned pineapple again

author: {'steamid': '76561198048139813', 'num_games_owned': 1113, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1454406389}
review:
Девочки, я не пойму, че вы плачите? Игра продавалась по 15 рублей за килограмм, даже если брать по 29 без скидки-вы реально думаете что игра не должна уступать каким ни будь Каловдути?
Игру делает один человек, не пять, не десять а один! Он за два месяца выпустил больше обновлений для игры чем разработчики H1Z1 и DayZ за год, вместе взятые!!! Что вы плачите как 15-ние девочки? Карточки стоят не по 1.5 рубля, а по 5-7 рублей. Хотите нормальные игры? Готовьтесь отдать как минимум 300 рублей.

review:
Kicked a soccer ball around, break danced, joined, froze for 20 seconds, found a pistol and pineapple juice, almost died to a snake that can walk through cliffs and died to a man that can teleport
10/10 best game I've ever played forget Insurgency and and Rainbow Six Siege, this is by far the most immersive survival shooter with a tactical feel. Definitely worth the $65 usd pricetag.

review:
A game with a great commercial! 
This game has not 2 maps or 3 maps, but one map!
This game is also home to an arsenal of a whopping number of 7 weapons. 
It will wow you with its 4 player games, and dazzel you with graphics so messy you will think you're in a lucid dream!

But what do I know I'm just a peasent trying to apease an unholy being which has so vicously clawed at the depths of my mind and has scared me permanently.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966782422', 'num_games_owned': 1270, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1454273689}
review:
A slow start to development, but a fun game to jump on and kill 30 minutes. Especially at its new ridiculously low price tag.

Start scattered across a wasteland, unarmed and hungry with up to 41 other players. Then it's a mad Battle Royale-style rush for guns and supplies in a 'Last Man Standing' firefight to the death in a shrinking arena.

review:
This game is one of my currently favorite games. People Have been saying that this game is buggy that theres framerate caps and that its laggy those are ALL LIES, I have currently playing for 14.2 hours and havent really seen a bug other then the ragdoll physic and peeking thru walls both of witch are not a big deal. There are not alot of people playing sadly so sometimes it can be hard to play but most of the time theres enough people. Honestly the only kind of people i could see hating it are people like/with Integrated graphics and are just bad at the game or people who dont aperciate that this is a dollar game.


I JUST DO NOT SEE THE PROBLEM PLOX HELP?

As i see its deffaintly worth the dollar.

Personally this is one of the best games i ever played for a dollar and in my opinon its better then arma's battle royal.

review:
Review 2017

After 1 year I expect i have see changes on this title but nothing happens, at least it big impact or big changes only few small changes here and there, nothing big to make me or anyone believes its gonna being grow up, the community its becoming small now every time and for what I can see the creator is still working in some stuff from the game but nothing big for what I see, for now I don't think it is a good idea buy it at least for now maybe after some big changes and maybe more features, it gets maybe more attention of the people gets too.

So my advice for now is waiting for something big!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Review 2016

This game is have a very long journey to be perfect but have potential to be it!

I recommend this if you dont have any thing better to do, or invite some friends to play it you.

For the price of 0,99€ or 1$ it's not so bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133027538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1453961155}
review: My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him. "if you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate. you have to stop immediately." Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exacly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me - "Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through". I agreed. At 25, i have never touched a cigarette. I must say. I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because this game gave me cancer anyway.

review:
Захожу я значит в игру за 17 р. 
Весь такой в надежде поиграть в нее... 
Вижу список серверов (Не помню колличество, но немного их было, не более 10 - ти скажем так) 
Жмакаю на первый попавшийся - зависло всё! (к слову 4 гб ОЗУ, i5 - 3450, GTX 550 ti 1 ГБ, согласен, далеко не мощная конфига, но я наивно надеялся что потянет... увы) 

Второй запуск игры и подхожу к этому вопросу уже не как наивный мальчишка верующий во всякое, а как решительно настроенный мужчина, обьективно оценивающий свои возможности и возможности своей "железяки"(Упрощаю оформление операционной системы, закрываю всё лишнее в трее, убиваю не угодные мне процессы использующие ресурсы ПК не в том направлении в котором требуют обстоятельства, запускаю клиент игры с конфигой "Мах FPS") 
НО! 
Замешкался в меню игры, потом и вовсе попал не туда курсором, в итоге всё зависло! 
Я же опытный (С этого момента опытный) воин, а опытный воин знает что "Побеждает тот кто умеет ждать"!
Прошло 2 часа...
"Железяка" оклималась! Но всё далеко не "торт". 
Клиент игры видимо лёг и стал каким то неподъёмным. 
Я не стал делать поспешных выводов. 
Это моя ошибка! С конца, то на конец! И винить я в этом должен только себя! 
Но выбора нет, кроме как дроп процесса и ребут системы...
Спустя некоторое время я был вновь готов к запуску клиента! 
Это было так волнительно, сосочки стояли, а ладохи вечно потели! 
И не смотря на волнение я был предельно собран и сосредоточен на игре (Уволился с работы, отключил все телефоны, закрыл шторы дабы солнечный свет не ослепил меня в самый не подходящий момент)

3 запуск игры, предварительно всё подготовив к этому моменту ("Мах FPS" и минимум нагрузки на оборудование, а и ещё, я провёл иследование, которое показало, что минимум пинга тоже не мало важно) я произвёл очередной запуск клиента игры. 
На этот раз я был как понос во время тифа, резок и жаждил крови! 
И боги вознаградили меня! Я подключился к серверу! Но это был ночной сервер (Я по сей день не могу простить себя за эту ошибку) 
Но прошлое редко нас во всём устраивает, а будущее нам не известно! И надо жить настоящим! 
В общем тот удачный запуск не описать словами, но я все же попробую "Темно, ничего не понятно, в наушниках какой то громкий и неприятный звук, всё лагало, но не смотря не на что это был уже сам процесс игры!" И это, уже результат! И он был намного приятней всех остальных негативных факторов! 
Мне к сожалению пришлось оставить свои попытки запуска клиента, так как на второй день без сна мой организм начинал уже подводить меня (разум был словно затуманен и переполнен иформацией, от чего ломило череп, нервная система была тоже не в порядке поэтому дергался глаз, а курение уже не спасало и из за него уже начало сильно колоть слева на вдохе) А я знал что эта игра не терпит ошибок.

В общем когда меня выпишут из больницы, я вернусь этой игре и добьюсь приемлемых результатов!
P.S =))) Не ждите от этой игры чудес (За 17 то рублей)! А просто попытайтесь найти что то позитивное самостоятельно. В любом случае хочу сказать спасибо разработчикам за их труд, надеюсь у вас всё получится и мы когда нибудь в это поиграем=)!

author: {'steamid': '76561198053882193', 'num_games_owned': 114, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1453920379}
review: Game is boring as all hell, nothing to do. You can't find anyone once you found the weapon so you just try to stay alive to kill that one person. The graphics are pretty rough too. Don't expect this game to be a clone of CS or anything. The good thing is that it's not too expensive so you can buy it even by accident and you won't notice. I've played many better games with better graphics, gameplay, music and pretty much everything for free. Imma give it a 3/10 cuz it's still in early development so it can get much better. It has the potential to do so. It just has to get more popular so there won't be 12 people on server but like 30 instead. That would be much more fun. Keep developing and you should get away with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973442714', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1456783378}
review:
Well... On vous avait prévenu !!!  A l'heure où j'écris ces lignes, le 23/01/2016 (2016 Nom-de-Dieu on est en 2016 et p-u-t-a-i-n c'est une honte de voir des dév nous pondre une chierie pareil XD !), il y a plus d'évaluations NEGATIVES que d'éval positives : 773 (-) contre 601 (+). Si cela ne vous décourage pas, alors continuez...

Sur la page du magasin c'est écrit :

- Down to One is a competitive survival shooter in a large, interactive, open-world environment. 
->Alors pour commencer, DTO ne se passe pas sur une large carte interactive. La carte est petite, délimitée par un bouclier virtuel (moche et diablement irréaliste) et si tu en sors trop longtemps (quelques minutes tout au plus), tu meurs. C’est le concept de Battle Royal, la zone à explorer rétrécit pour que les joueurs se retrouvent et se butent. Cette carte n’a rien à voir avec celle d’un S.T.A.L.K.E.R. ou d’un GTA3, 4, 5 par exemple.
Pour ce qui est de l’interactivité, elle se limite à quelques serpents ici ou là dans les rochers, je le précise…

- Start out with nothing, and use anything you can find in the environment to survive, and eliminate other competitors over the course of a brutal round. 
->Ca c’est vrai… Mais il faut comprendre que l’on ne trouve pas de flingues dans le désert donc on va vers les maisons, ou les bases désaffectées, et on rencontre les autres joueurs. Quand on n’a pas un bon fusil, on se fait buter comme un con (comprenez the course of a brutal round).

- Realistic Bullet Physics: With physics values from real-world guns, bullet drop, and dynamic bullet penetration, ranged combat has never felt so good.
->Bon ça, ça reste à prouver, pour moi c’est de la poudre aux yeux, un bon informaticien qui a vendu 2 ou 3 copieurs n’aurait pu faire mieux…

- Dynamic Looting: Everyone loves looting. With custom loot spawning mechanics, you'll find things where they should be. 
->Ouiiii !!! Il faut louuu-ter !!! C’est-à-dire chercher des ressources (barres de céréales, paquets de chips, eau) parce que dans le désert, ça pardonne pas : au bout de 4 minutes on est mort de faim !!!! 4 MINUTES !!! Le round est brutal, il va très vite, c’est suuuuuper-réaliste… La mort par la faim ne prévient pas, elle arrive et vous fauche (enfin pour tout dire, si il y a un marqueur qui clignotte, mais ca va très vite, comme une fringale pour un coureur du tour de France qui n’a pas pris son EPO au petit déjeuner… CRAC !! Elle est là).

- Customization: Play how you want to - take perks that let you knock players weapons out of their hands, play dead to confuse your opponents, and much more. 
->Perk… On y vient : pour les débloquer, il vous faudra jouer, faire fis des bugs, de cette main qui tient une arme et qui a un bidon accroché dans son avant bras… Les perks ont l’air sexy, comme faire le mort par exemple, il y a une touche spéciale pour cela, mais c’est toujours de la poudre aux yeux, personne ne s’en sert, car pour débloquer la perk, il faut jouer... et jouer... et encoooore jouer !

- Built For Performance: With support for 4K resolution, 64bit-only systems and DX11, your hardware won't get bored easily.
->Le jeu est dégueulasse, No Comment !! Ca donnerait la gerbe à un putois...

- Advanced 'Netcode': Our networking system dynamically changes network update rates - 'tickrate' - as the player count decreases throughout a round. 
->Là on t’explique que le jeu est révolutionnaire et qu’il se modifie de lui-même en temps réel au fûr et à mesure que les joueurs sont tués. En même temps il y a tellement de joueurs au même moment sur les serveurs qu’ils peuvent coder les parties en temps réel avec 3 devs !!!!

http://steamcharts.com/app/334040


- Dedicated Servers: Don't settle for games hosted on someone's dial-up. Our high performance dedicated servers will make multiplayer feel like you're at a LAN. 
->Ils ont 2 ou 3 serveurs qui font des folies, Woooooouuuuuuuu, Youpiiii c’est la fête !!!

http://steamcharts.com/app/334040

- Immersive Interaction: Interact with anything you find in the environment with & use it to your advantage. 
->C’est bugguy, il faut interagir avec une zone autour de l’objet pour le prendre…

- Full Body Character: It's hard to have an immersive experience as a floating pair of hands. In Down To One, what you see is what you get. 
->Le corps en entier, super, c’est difficile d’avoir une expérience avec une paire de bras flottants…. Et c’est une expérience réaliste de voir dans ton avant bras l’item que tu viens de ramasser… lol ils sont au bout, ils ne savent plus quoi mettre !!

- Improved Anticheat: With a custom anticheat system, and authoritative networking features, we're aiming to tackle cheating head-on. 
->Je n’ai pas testé le cheat, et n’ai pas passé suffisamment de temps dans le jeu pour le constater, mais si c’est la même équipe qui s’y est collé… Ca laisse rêveur !

- Responsive Input: Raw input sampling and competitively calibrated sensitivity. If you miss, it's not our fault. 
->Bon encore une phrase de vendeur de copieur… Ils sont bons !!!

- Esports Support: With over 40 regular tournaments held so far, we're putting the competition into survival.
->Ces tournois sont leur prétexte pour lacher des Updates tous les 3 jours en disant que c’est La super update qui corrige tous les bugs, que la Méga update ne va plus tarder, mais qu’il y a un nouveau tournoi qui augmente l’Xp pour débloquer les perks…

-----------------------------------------------------------

Jeu truffé de bugs (je ne les détaille pas j’ai quand même une vraie vie moi, si t’es curieux lis les évaluations), textures dégueulasses, pas de joueurs.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Il était vendu 15 € ça a été un succès tel, qu’ils ont décidé de le passer à 0,99 € car ils avaient gagné tellement d’argent-que-comme-ils-sont-philantropes-ils-s’en-foutaient… Mais moi je l’ai eu à 0,60 € ;o)


DONC EVALUATIONS POSITIVE PARCE QU’ILS M’ONT FAIT BEAUCOUP RIGOLER !!!!

Pas d'update depuis un an !

DROP UN LIKE EN BAS POUR DIRE QUE CETTE EVAL A ETE UTILE (c'est important AUSSI pour les devs ;o)

review:

1) Join the game
2) Dont worry if *programm has stopped working* comes out

6) Die waiting

Enjoy!

author: {'steamid': '76561198058860989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1453503062}
review:
I do not have any words for this game so...
But i got a recipe for a chocolate cake:

The Best Chocolate Cake Recipe {Ever}

PRINT
PREP TIME
15 mins
COOK TIME
30 mins
TOTAL TIME
45 mins
 
Chocolate Cake with decadent chocolate frosting that will quickly become your favorite!
Author: Robyn Stone | Add a Pinch
Cuisine: Dessert
Serves: 12
INGREDIENTS
2 cups all-purpose flour
2 cups sugar
¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder
2 teaspoons baking powder
1½ teaspoons baking soda
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon espresso powder
1 cup milk
½ cup vegetable or canola oil
2 eggs
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
1 cup boiling water
Chocolate Buttercream Frosting Recipe
INSTRUCTIONS
Preheat oven to 350º F. Prepare two 9-inch cake pans by spraying with baking spray or buttering and lightly flouring.
For the cake:
Add flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt and espresso powder to a large bowl or the bowl of a stand mixer. Whisk through to combine or, using your paddle attachment, stir through flour mixture until combined well.
Add milk, vegetable oil, eggs, and vanilla to flour mixture and mix together on medium speed until well combined. Reduce speed and carefully add boiling water to the cake batter. Beat on high speed for about 1 minute to add air to the batter.
Distribute cake batter evenly between the two prepared cake pans. Bake for 30-35 minutes, until a toothpick or cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and allow to cool for about 10 minutes, remove from the pan and cool completely.
Frost cake with Chocolate Buttercream Frosting.
NOTES
The cake batter will be very thin after adding the boiling water. This is correct and results in the most delicious and moist chocolate cake I've ever tasted! xo

review:
Sure, this game may have some bugs, broken animations, bad movement, not a whole ton of optimisation and some Legacy Rust landscape. But I enjoy this game a whole ton.

You just have to be one of those people that can ignore how flawed a game can look and be and focus on the gameplay inside, and it's great!

It has a great battle royal gamemode which may have some flaws, but you need to work around them to have fun. It's worth the price, and with time who knows. Maybe this game will be much better.

It's a solid game to play with mates and kill some time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043364962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1453327815}
review:
I will start this review by mentioning  that it is almost entirely inconsequential if you download this game or not. Maybe this game is worth 1 USD. 

Once you enter the game you will be greeted by an increadibly irritating sound effect that plays when scrolling-over or selecting something (great first impression). The next thing you will notice is the small  amount of servers and maps. In fact, there is only one map in this game, it includes 20 square miles of desert and 3 buildings. Good luck finding one of the 3 servers in america having the minimum amount of six players on it to start. if you do, you will run around  for 15 minutes looking at clunky animations and hilarious amounts of boring landscape. Spectator mode is one of the worst parts of this game. Not only will you be spending most of your time in it, but the glitchiness of it is incredible. Headache inducing animations and shaking. Like I said at the start, you can download and experience this game with almost no physical expense. But I believe it is an incredible waste of time. Just play TF2 ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197984087724', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1626, 'last_played': 1502806352}
review:
”H1Z1 King of the Killを劣化させてバグを大量に詰め込んだゲーム”

↑これがこのゲームを最も的確に紹介する一文だと思う。

私は毎試合が大変楽しかったので、なんだかんだで結構な時間プレイしてしまい、
内心サムズアップではあるのだが、結論から言うと、
現状（ver1.2.0）はもはや、対戦相手が見つからない死んだゲームとなってしまった。




『如何に待ち時間を耐え抜くか』
がゲーム中最大のキモになってしまっていた1.0.2当時。

プレイに耐えうるpingのサーバーは少なく、というよりサーバー数が少なく、
更に言えばプレイ人口が少なく、1試合に12人も集まれば大勢での試合と言える。

「プレイ開始可能な人数は揃っているのにゲームが一向に開始しない」
（※ESC押してシステムメニューから[READY UP]を押す、これに気づき難いらしいぞ）

「ゲーム終盤、１vs１の状況で相手が見つからず延々と彷徨う」
（※生存人数と行動地域に沿ってエリアが縮小するようにはなっているが、
　　両者とも芋り出すとゲームが終わらない）

Kick権限や制限時間というものが無いため、
上記のような人的不具合に毎試合あたっていた。

待ち時間10～30分
実際の対戦15～20分

その結果、1試合に30～40分以上かかることは多いのだが、
途中参加が出来ない仕様のため、現状の人口ではどこかで試合が始まると、
その試合が終わるまで、ラグが酷くストレスの多い観戦モードに15～20分INするか、
1人、他のサーバーでサッカーボールを蹴って20$を稼ぎ続けるか、しかない。

終盤、残り数人の状態で、高低差はあるが遮蔽物のない山岳方面に
バトルフィールドが縮小され、稜線を利用しながら敵と撃ち合い、
弾が尽きたらステルスキルに移行する・・・なんて型にハマったりすると
非常に面白かったのだが、今後に期待するのは無駄な行為だろう。

author: {'steamid': '76561197971509396', 'num_games_owned': 3860, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1453158814}
review:
​​
Lanzado inicialmente en Enero de 2015 en acceso anticipado.

El concepto del juego nos sitúa en un "mundo abierto" en el cual tendremos que buscar recursos tan básicos como son agua, comida, botiquines y por su puesto armas y munición pues todo ello será necesario para que podamos sobrevivir al resto de jugadores de la ronda (41 supuestamente). Como veis se puede resumir en lo que conocemos como batalla a muerte (o Battle Royal). Los trailers del juego lo venden bastante bien pues muestran un juego que parece ser solido desde el mismo comienzo de su lanzamiento en acceso anticipado. 

En esto momento es Enero de 2016 y el juego ha salido de acceso anticipado, sin embargo sigue estando prácticamente igual que en sus comienzos. 

Si no tenemos en cuenta su calidad gráfica ni la de sus animaciones (ambas son bastante malas) y que no dispone de "mundo abierto" lo mínimo que podemos pedir en un juego "terminado" es que no tenga errores importantes que afecten a su jugabilidad...y en este aspecto está plagado de errores (gráficos, físicas, sistema de colisiones, netcode...) Por su puesto nunca vas a ver un servidor con 42 personas, si tienes suerte en el momento que lo pruebes podrás encontrarte con un grupo de 10 y en un servidor de alto ping (mas de 150 generalmente)...

Down to One hubiera podido ser un juego de bastante éxito si sus desarrollares hubieran trabajado algo más en él, pero se ha quedado en otro engaño más dentro del mundo de los accesos anticipados.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090888485', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1453115005}
review:
Это мой первый отрицательный обзор.
Для разных игр я искал разные плюсы и минусы, и даже если минусов больше то я игре давал шанс быть хорошей.
Многие со мной не соглашались, но мне посрать, ведь я к ним не прислушывался. Ведь у  меня свое мнение)
И вот Down To One.
Что это?
ЧТО ЭТО ЗА ГОВНО ЗА 29 РУБЛЕЙ??
Эта игра даже 10 рублей не стоит.
Я не разу не сыграл потому что после окончания боя меня выкидывало в в меню.
Краткое описание:
-Меню на инглише
-Мало серверов
-Есть перки
-Есть разный камуфляж
-Есть оружие
-Есть говноприцел
-Есть одна карта
-Есть много нубов
-Я есть Грут
И этим все сказанно.
Вы мазахист? Эта игра для вас!

author: {'steamid': '76561198200740994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 989, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1460377802}
review:
BROKEN LANGUAGE ALERT! I'm not a native English speaker, but I'll try my best to make my thoughts clear and literate.

 Well, it seems that Down To One is being criticised for it's animation, optimisation, some bugs, that spoil gaming experience, and that is a problem. But still, this game has some interesting features and ideas, which, anyway, need to be polished and refined. 
For those, who don't know - Down To One is a game with a conceps similar to one in a japanese movie "Battle Royal", and it's the closest one to it. 42 men start a survival deathmatch with only one to be victorious.

Here are some things, that I think are good
+ Concept of matches is clear and easy to understand for a novice: you start at one location (or near a random one, if it is a server feature), get to any location to get some loot to start. Then, it's a weapon crate drop in a random location and playable area starts to decrease, making players move to a final location. Not speaking of survival part, which is obvious nowdays. And this is good.
+ Terrain of a map sometimes make sense. Snakes spawn near the rocks, waiting for players, There is a mine field, that is laid... well... tactically correct, if you ask me. Sometimes you can find water under trees in desert. But finding a pistol or an axe in a basket is a bit strange, but still rewarding.
+ Skill set is well-balanced, but not perfectly. You can't make an OP combination of perks however you try. But some game features make some skills not so effective (for example, "Play Dead" is irrelevant, as you get a message about a person died if he dies for real). This is easy to be fixed, and I hope developers know how to do it better.
+ There are enough weapons for a game released 11 days ago. I've not got tired of shooting this weapons as I haven't tried all of them. But I hope there will be more of it. And by the way, it's a pleasure for me to shoot with all this guns. I feel all the guns more realistic, than guns in Call Of Duty: Black Ops 3 *smiley face*.

I know, thet there are some bugs, problems with optimisation, animation and graphics, but I won't tell a thing about it as I'm OK with it and play on "Maximum FPS" settings. So it's not me to tell you about the graphics, but still it's not too bad.

The real problems are:
- Hit detection system is too random. It seems bearable if you shoot guns, but in melee you shall pray Tzeentch or any other god of Random to land a punch or get a target with an axe (especially snakes. If you meet it without a gun - you are 80% dead). The problem is that you can go through you enemy while fighting, and so can your fist/melee weapon, so hit will not be counted (I don't really know how to explain it). Just make player models solid, and it will be easier.
- Snakes. Snakes! SNAAAAAKES! Oh god I never thought that i will hate this creatures so much. They are way too dangerous here They bite as strong as a US soldier punch you in the face (according to logic of a game). And they decrease your hunger and thirst bars every time they bite. And they bite really frequent. And you think they are easy to be killed, huh? HELL NO! You will be 3\4 dead, thirsty and hungry when you will finally get it. And it seemed to me, that I spend as much bullets to kill a snake as to kill a player. Nerf them or make them easier to hit. GG FIX PEASE!
- Ladders. The thing is you don't reach the top of a ladder as you climb, so you have to jump to get to the roof. But that's a minor one. As some other minor ones I won't be wasting time here.
- Servers. There are too few of them and they restart after evey match. and it's a bit hard to hit 42 men on one server. Or maybe it's so because of my time zone. Make some less maximum players on servers and make more servers themselves. This will be great. Really.

To sum up... This game is good. Not great, but playable. something "7.1/10" if you ask me. Good for an indie. And of course, I recomend it to survival genre fans wwho are tired of zombies and all fans of "Battle Royal" concept. 
I hope developers from Gadget Games read this reviev. You do great now. Don't give this game up. You still can make it better and better and I look forward content patches in future. Good luck with Down To One. Do your best.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001088538', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1452986748}
review:
Cosas que hacer en Down to One

1-Comienza dándole patadas a un balón.
2-Deleitate con las conseguidas animaciones.
3-Corre en cualquier dirección a través de montañas escarpadas y caídas de gran altura. (because you can)
4-Encuentra botellas de agua que brillan en la oscuridad.
5-Encuentra un  pueblo y busca un arma y comida, ya que por el ritmo al que te mueres de hambre y de sed debes de ser un adicto a la comida con un metabolismo más rápido que el de un gorila.
6-Encuentra una serpiente flotando en el aire, piensa que es inofensiva y pierde la mitad de la vida intentando darle un puñetazo.
7-Observa como la zona empequeñece sin producir ningún bug visual (IRONÍA)
8-Encuentra a un enemigo, apunta con la mira y descubre que está más desviada que Carmen de Mairena.
9-Comienza una batalla épica en la que llegado un determinado punto dudarás de siquiera estar disparando.
10-Ve morir a tu compañero y siente como le posee el demonio. (ver captura en mi perfil)
11-Muere.
12-Sal del juego.
13-Puesto que este es un juego bohemio y salir sin más es demasiado mainstream, el juego decide crashearse para que te acuerdes de él y tu orgasmo a la hora de desinstalarlo sea mayor.

11/10 Me pasaría toda la vida viendo la animación de correr en bucle.

(40 minutos asegurados de carcajadas con amigos, en el caso de...)

review: its a very, very good concept, and usually i dont reveiw games (if that gives you any sort of idea) The concept, as i mentioned is very.. very good, i enjoy it quite a lot honestly, but with it being so early access there are a lot of bugs as you would expect. the main issue i run into is framerate, even on the lowest settings i get a pretty decent amoutn of lag, and im running a gtx 650 as a graphics card, to give you a baseline, and dear god the night maps are BEAUTIFUL! but, again i experience even more lag on these (although thats to be expected) overall id grab the game now, but have a bit of patience if you decide to dive headfirst into the game, it will be an enjoyable expericne for the most part, but you must keep in mind its a early access when forming your opinion of the game! overall, wonderful game! just needs better optimization

author: {'steamid': '76561197999877977', 'num_games_owned': 1477, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1452935657}
review:
Refund button works.


Read the comment that this game was like H1Z1 BR......only it's not even slightly good.

1. Multiplayer is pretty dead
2. It controls like an old N64 shooter......not so much like a Goldeneye, as much as it is like the Southpark shooter.
3. The multiplayer really makes very little sense, it tries crossing survival mode in with the Battle Royale mode, and it just isn't fun.
4. Graphics are nothing to brag about
5. I guess for $0.99 you could potentially get some entertainment value from this game, I couldn't, but maybe if you and a few friends get drunk, and want to waste a few hours, then maybe.


 I can't see this game being played longterm by any person with the amount of shooters out there. I just feel like I have went back in time and played PO'd or some subpar PS1/N64 era shooter that I would pull out of the discount bin and say what the hell, it's cheap....and then instantly regret everything.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995215274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1452877001}
review:
How to start?

Down to one is literally the worst shooter I've played that actually runs.

The game they try to sell is a survival shoot your friends. The game they give you... well, it's more like CSGO minus all the things that make CSGO worthwhile.

The weapons feel flighty. The lack of indicators followed by your quickly dying means that most fights are horrifically one sided. The bleed mechanic, how rediculously fast you get hungry and thirsty.

There is literally nothing done well about this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088776618', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1499082285}
review: Has much potential. the concept of the game is very fun and enjoyable especialy with friends but the glitchiness of the game like slight cliping problems are annoying but seem to be minor. the game is very well optimised and has pretty good netcode, i have bad internet but i am still able to play it with next to no connection issues and there is almost always a server with people to play with on. things that i think would make for a better game is better animations for the guns so they arent always in the way and things like a score board and a few other minor things but over all for the price and small download size it is a fun game to kill some time on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035625303', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 12396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5, 'playtime_at_review': 12302, 'last_played': 1712255647}
review:
I never had over 100+ hours for a 2 week time period on Steam or made 40+ $ from a game until I played this game

Reasons to spend ur next dollar on this game:
1. Fun and intense game-play that rewards precision shooting instead of spray and pray
2. Hilarious glitches worth 1$ even if you don't appreciate the game-play
3. Weekly Cups w/ 25 AUD$ for first every Friday at 8:30 AM NY time, so if you really don't like this game then at least you can win your money back :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198017329042', 'num_games_owned': 1912, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1979, 'last_played': 1452839026}
review:
+  Good concept
+ Perk system
+  Frequent updates, and devs are actually active in the forums, I give them that.

- Terribly optimized
- Technically horrible
- Laughable animations and clipping issues (with also LE FUNNI ragdoll physics)
- Random server crashes
- When you die you have to wait A LOT for the next round (and be lucky no one gets afk in a hidden place and people are about to kill each other to end the match).
- Very few servers (that most of the time are already in mid-game. Prepare to wait).

I encourage the devs to improve the game (even though that would be a lot of work) because it looks promising afterall. Just heavily unfinished.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019265286', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1452815836}
review:
When I say the bug report feature was broken, that should raise a red flag.

The redeeming features of this game have dropped Down To None. I'm certainly glad I only spent 50 cents on this game, because it isn't worth a penny more. 

This game is the result of removing everything fun about survival games and adding god awful controls. Prepare to spend fifteen minutes wandering a dark barren desert with default Unity sandstorm assets before you are killed in an instant by a player with a dial up connection who found a gun before you. Or perhaps you'd prefer to have your health drained by not being inside the play zone because it moves away from you literally faster than you can run towards it. 

You move approximately 30% of your run speed when walking backwards. Why it was designed that way I'll never know. I'm not even certain that any aethetic design went into this game. It has zero style.

Perhaps if this game got a complete overhaul it'd be worth playing, but for now save your money for a double cheeseburger at McDonalds. A message to the developers. Just quit working on the game and work on something new. This game has zero potential. I'm truly sorry for everyone involved, myself included.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169724951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1465023769}
review:
Good game so far i have played i have put some pro's and con's together

Pro's
1. Good idea for a game
2. Super cheap
3. lots of slots for people to join
4. Fun to play with a friend
5. You can kick a soccer ball while u wait for the round to start :D

Con's :(
1. Werid animation bugs
2. Profomace issues. PS. could just be my pc
3. Needs more people to fill those empty slots.
4. needs more servers in diffrent regions
5. takes to long to join a server. i always join it to late then i have to spectate ;-;
6. player models dont really match the situation you are in. 

Overall thought

i do give this game a positive rating but it still needs alot of work. Give it a few weeks and it should be good to go.
mind you its only a $1 not much to expect. but overall 5/10 atm. get it now while its $0.50 

Good luck and see you in the arena :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198048469902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1452771971}
review:
เกมนี้จะเล่นเป็นรอบๆ เมื่อทุกคนเข้าห้องและกดพร้อมแล้วเกมจะ
สุ่มให้ผู้เล่นเกิดตามจุดต่างๆของแมพ และผู้เล่นต้องหาอาวุธกระสุน อาหาร น้ำ ประทังชีพ
โดยในแมพจะมีแอร์ดรอปให้เพื่อล่อให้คนไปยิงกันมากขึ้น และในแมพจะค่อยๆลดพื้นที่ลง
ใครที่อยู่บอกเขตเลือดจะลดเรื่อยๆ เรียกได้ว่าเป็นการเร่ง pvp กัน และใครอยู่รอดเป็นคนสุดท้ายเป็น
ผู้ชนะไป

โมชั่นในเกม และระบบ ก็ทำออกมาแบบหยาบๆ แต่ก็ใช้งานได้
หากเราเข้าไปในห้องโดยที่เกมยังไม่จบเราจะต้องรอจนกว่าจะจบ
บางครั้งกินเวลาไป 20-30 นาที

คุณภาพเกมก็สมราคาดี เล่นฆ่าเวลา

author: {'steamid': '76561198106658258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 3464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3464, 'last_played': 1452966279}
review:
EDITED: It is sad to  say that all i've said below turne out to be untrue, the game hasn't made any significant improvment, I thus turned this review into a negative one. NOT WORTH BUYING!


I can say without a doubt that this game has indeed a very bright future. Let me try to make this quick and clear for you guys :)

Okay, first off  I honeslty think that since I am one ofthe very few people whom have played this game for a long-ish period of time, I could write an honest review. 

As any other game of its gern, and the early stages of games, it is very buggy.. But with a great dev team who is working very hard on fixing the game, it is improving, and getting an update almost every week, which is more than what we need. The game has outstanding graphics, in my opinion. Also a very realistic survival atmosphere.

Let me just sum everything up, because I don't want to tackle every aspect of the game in detail and waste your time so the following main review is bascially look at the whole game and every aspect of it.

The game has lots of bugs, and that bascially ruins the neatness of the game, if it had no bugs at all, it would've been a complete 100% 10/10 survival game of its gern( I am taking into consideration every aspect you might think of, for example, the graphics, optimization, or even skill). But since the bugs are fading bit by bit, through the unwavering efforts of the Dev team, I suggest that you either wait a while until it is improved to its fullest ( which will happen in time) or you can support the devs in order to speed up the fixing of the game. The game haso nly one problem as I've mentioned multiple times, the bgus are the sole problem with the game, whether it may be in the game itself or in the server connection, whatever it is, it is the only problem with the game. Maybe the physics is a little off, more like way off, but they're working on it.

If any of the developlers are reading this, I'd like to just give you a peice of advise.

Your game is great, you just need to keep up the effort long enough, and fix them buggy bugs, in order to make it great, and when it is great and fixed, don't run off with the money. Also, DO NOT read any of the negative reviews, because that will only make you feel down and feel the loss of hope towards the game, so just hang in there, keep up the good work, and in three months tops,  I guarantee that this game will have great review %age.

The only con is that it costs 60 cents. Please be Free 2 Play.

review: First off, steam says that I have played 21 minutes of this game...WRONG! I spent 21 minutes attempting to play this game. Have not been able to actually get into any matches and when it does try to  load into one, screen goes black and takes me back to main screen, locks on a black screen, or the loading screen. I would be pissed if I payed more than 59 cents for this game. In my mind 10 cents would be to much to ask for this load of crap. Maybe fix all the bugs in the game before trying to lure people in with low prices. I would gladly pay upwards of 20 bucks if this game was even halfway decent, being that I love pvp fps games. Thanks for wasting my time, the developers of this game should be ashamed of themselves.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970864071', 'num_games_owned': 511, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1452720338}
review:
Don't buy this game. Don't even look at this game, just f*cking don't. It's not worth it, I don't care that its £0.50, I don't care that you want to buy it to laugh at it, because that's not what this game is.

A group of friends and I decided to buy it as a joke, we then spent 40 minutes looking for a server, suffering frequent crashes, and ultimately realising that it appears impossible to even host a private server between friends. Luckily the spectator mode worked, so we got to see the 'advanced netcode' in action, as players jittered around in a t-pose like action figures placed onto a speaker, occasionally flinging themselves into the sky, or getting stuck doing a satanic version of either a prayer to cthulu, or the YMCA song (your pick) .

To conclude: DON'T DO IT, RUN, JUST F*CKING RUN.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975498458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3011, 'last_played': 1539772402}
review:
Вижу кучу отрицательных обзоров от школьников, которые за пол часа так и не научились играть и гневно потребовали назад космическую сумму в 17 рублей =)
По сути могу сказать, что геймплей очень затягивает и, если не обращать внимания на графические баги, и проблемы с пингом до американских серверов, то играется отлично отлично.
Да, оптимизация кривая, да, если дисконнект - то ты труп, да графон не как в высокобюджетных боевиках, но за свою цену игра уникальна и неслабо затягивает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014868960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1452700517}
review:
最初にまずゲームが楽しめません。
タイトルからプレイを選択しサーバー一覧を表示する際にまず応答がなくなります。
待つことしばらくようやくサーバーを選択し入室しロード画面へと行こうするのですが此処で新たな問題。
無駄に長いロードの果てはタイトル画面へと戻されます。
理由が分からないですが身内が同じく悲しみを背負ったのでおすすめできません。
気分はさながら、うきうき気分で火遊びをしようと思ったら物が湿気っていた心情です。

review:

O jogo é tão bugado e escroto que a unica coisa que você vai pagar por ele é sua vontade de rir com os amigos do quão quebrado é o jogo.

Resumindo: Não é um jogo, é um bug interativo. (e eu não estou exagerando)

review:
Игра гавно. Не понятно как вообще играть в это убожество, минимальные системные требования не соответствуют гавнографике этой игры, заходя на любой педобирский сервер это нeвзъебенно аxуительной игры непонятно как в неё начать играть потому что ты весишь в воздухе хyй пойми в какой то пустыне.
Да и на последок - она поддерживает не все виды мониторов. Так чт оесли у Вас не широкоформатный дисплей с неплохим разрешением - она у вас просто напросто не влезет. МИНУС, ОГРОМНЫЙ МИНУС

author: {'steamid': '76561198065043460', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1452692255}
review:
等了10多分钟，终于看完了lag秀，然后无任何提示滚到了菜单。之后打了一盘DM（死斗），结束的时候也是全都玩家都被踢出了服务器，这我觉得这个与其说是“设定”不如说是致命bug。由于结束就被踢出来，非DM模式加入一个已经开始了的游戏似乎并没有什么意义，然后我就明白了这游戏为何全部在线人数只有不到100人……看完戏就被踢了哪里有你玩的份？
全部只有8个服务器，vpn挂与不挂都是这么多个。你也不能直接在游戏内自己开服和朋友撕逼。老外都在叫：“啊这辣鸡游戏tm延迟丢包卡飞了。”是啊100ping的服务器人都在漂移，时不时做出一些扭曲的动作。
模型细节做得不错，可以看到美工上下了点功夫，然而让他们动起来之后就是一片惨淡，一般低成本游戏动作烂也算是情有可原，这吃东西的动作极其诡异，右手拿着枪又拿着道具，道具和枪重叠显示，观察别的玩家的鸡苗模式还能看到武器内部构造。

3块钱还掉卡买完给差评还是不好意思，希望以后能进步吧

author: {'steamid': '76561198043179568', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1452557455}
review:
I tried, I really did. 
I'm going to be rude so please understand, here's a suggestion:
Go to any minecraft Hunger Games arena on those big 500 players+ server (More than this game's all time peak, I bet)
Copy their concept into the game.

The thing about this game is that it's so boring and there's nothing to do that it just make me want to play something else. If you can get teleported into a small Deathmatch after a *short* amount of time whether you like it or not, then the game will be more interesting and fast paced so other don't have to wait.

The other thing is optimization. Just horrid, I went onto a server and the models gets this annoying laggy look, then the corpses morth into some kind of monster which I WILL have nightmare tonight. Movement is like Fistful of Frags, only worst. In what case do I walk backward and sideways like a turtle, try and walk backward and sideways in real life, then apply that into your game.

World is nice, model is nice (except when they're turning into monster),
Animation: COMPLETELY BROKEN, your gun doesn't get put away so what you do is, you have a gun in your hand, while at the same time using the same hand, you grab a drink that gets overlapsed on the gun and chug it in. Why.

Graphics is a different issue, it is okay for me personally because I don't take it that serious, the models for the map looks like it was made out of a game from 2010. 

I played one match. And that was it, I waited 20 minutes for those 3 minutes only to get kill by guy with a shotgun and then I waited 10 more minutes and I said:"You know what. I'm going to spend money on Arma than to suffer in this game"

I recommended one of my friend in school. I regret every single word I said. "Oh well it's just 59 cents! How bad can it be! We should play together!" No. No. And No.

Please fix all or some or any issues described. Thanks. I'm looking forward for your future improvement. Don't take my word too harsh, just speaking out my thoughts. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198260605937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1452556221}
review: This game sucks. Dont let the pictures fool you, this game is not worth any money at all. I can run most games on high so this game was a breeze for my computer on ultra, but even then the graphics are horrible, same as the frames. I know I havent played long but it is near impossible for you to. As soon as you start the game a poorly made menu screen will pop up, you will have to position the mouse to the left of what you want to select.  After selecting play you will wait a couple minutes while all six of the servers pop up. If you manage to find one with more than ten people then you will spawn into a laggy, poorly designed map. People only punch eachother and you cant get away from spawn because there are cliffs surrounding the spawn that kill you if yopu try to leave, on some maps it is possible to not kill yourself, but unlikely. If the servers were ever populated it would be hell trying to fit 42 players inside a area the size of a small gym during the start. This game is not worth your time. It is laggy, glitchy, poorly designed, and no matter what rig you have you cant see shit thanks to the glorious 15-20 frames this game decides to gift upon our grateful asses.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058204854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1452544288}
review:
Put simply: It's a mess right now. And though I haven't played other games from the genre, I don't think it stands out much from others in its genre.

Positives:
+Extremely cheap to buy (59 cents at the time I bought it and am writing this)
+Perk System

Negatives:
- I'm pretty sure there's nothing here you haven't seen in another game of the genre
- Graphics aren't good (and are glitchy)
- Not optimized well, not at all (I have a 970 graphics card, but can't get anywhere near stable framerate past low settings. Even on low, it feels staggered)
- Glitchy as can be (Climbing a ladder will likely have you INSIDE the ladder, and you won't automatically get off the ladder until you're a few feet above it. There are a few other annoying glitches, but I'd rather keep this short)
- Less than good weapon spawns. You likely won't find a weapon until someone has already shot you with one they were lucky enough to find. I understand that they're supposed to be scarce, but it shouldn't take me 10 minutes just to find a little knife
-Gameplay is rough. I haven't been able to try out a gun yet, but the rest feels like one of the lower quality mods using the Half-Life engine

Quick little note: This is an EARLY early access game. It came out on early access 4 days ago, so my guess is that the dev merely wanted to rush something out so he can get funding for it.

Summary: It's a case of "the quality you'd expect for the price you paid" in its current state. I have no clue how much the devs are wanting to put into it, so who knows where it'll end up in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096790351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1453842335}
review: КОГДА Я ТОЛЬКО УВИДЕЛ ВАШУ ИГРУ, Я БЫЛ НЕПОДДЕЛЬНО РАД. Я ДУМАЛ ЧТО НАКОНЕЦ-ТО НАШЕЛ АНАЛОГ КОНТЕР СТРАЙКА ГО И ДЕЙЗА В ОДНОМ ЛИЦЕ, ДА И ВСЕГО-ТО ЗА 13 РУБЛЕЙ. В КОТОРОЙ ОБЕЩАЛОСЬ СУПЕР-РЕАЛИСТИЧНОЕ ВЫЖИВАНИЕ НА ОГРОМНОЙ КАРТЕ. ЗАЙДЯ В ЭТУ ПРЕКРАСТНУЮ ИГРУ, Я БЫЛ ПОРАЖОН ДЕТАЛЬНОЙ ПРОРАБОТКАЙ ИНТЕРФЕЙСА, И НИЗКИМ УРОВНЕМ ВХОЖДЕНИЯ. ЗАЙДЯ НА СЕРВЕР С МОИМ ДРУГОМ, МЫ СНАЧАЛА НЕ МОГЛИ ПОВЕРИТЬ СВОИМ ГЛАЗАМ. НАСТОЛЬКО ПРЕКРАСНАЯ БЫЛА В ИГРЕ ГРАФИКА. СЕРЬЕЗНА, ЕСЛИ СРАВНИВАТЬ ЕЕ С КОНКУРЕНТАМИ, ТО ОНА НА ГОЛОВУ ВЫШЕ КВЕЙКА 3 ПО ГРАФИКЕ. УПРАВЛЕНИЕ И ФИЗИКА ДОСТОЙНЫ ОТДЕЛЬНОГО СЛОВА. Я ДАВНО ИСКАЛ ИГРУ ГДЕ СТРЕЛЯЯ ИЗ АК-47 ТЫ ТОЧНО НЕ ПОПАДЕШЬ В ЧЕЛОВЕК, ДАЖЕ В УПОР, ПРЯМ КАК НА РЕАЛЬНОЙ ВОЙНЕ. ПРО ОТКРЫТЫЙ МИР Я ВООБЩЕ МОЛЧУ, БРАКОДЕЛАМ ИЗ БОГЕМИЯ ИНТЕРАКТИВ НУЖНО ВЗЯТЬ В ПРИМЕР, И В ДЕЙЗЕ ТОЖЕ ОБНЕСТИ 1 ГОРОД ПРОЗРАЧНЫМИ СТЕНАМИ, ЭТО ДЕЛАЕТ ИГРУ НАМНОГО БОЛЕЕ ДИНАМИЧНОЙ. НА ЭТОМ ВСЕ, СОВЕТУЮ ВСЕМ БРАТЬ. 10\1

review: Horribly optimized, and the animations don't even work. When going to pickup items, your hand clips through the entire thing. It also happens when eating/drinking. If you have a weapon out and try to use a drink, you still hold the gun while the drink is in your hand. Spawning in the game is a mess; prepare to get beaten to death within the first 30 seconds. All in all, just save your money and buy Arma 3 or even H1Z1 for battle royale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022583487', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1452450085}
review:
The game is buggy and very poor graphicly and animation wise, but is fun enough for 60 cents. Once you learn the basics of this kind of game like where good items spawn, how useless your fists are, and how to cheese the game with movement issues (crouching and jumping when climbing vertical boulders and moving through cluttered/low walkways.

This game is worth at most 1 dollar and even then that might be pushing it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961016378', 'num_games_owned': 695, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1478005555}
review:
If you enjoy the Battle Royale style of H1 or other similar games, you should try this out.  It's very early, it doesn't have heavy funding or staffing on the team to get everything worked out right away, but it's a blast.  Even H1, who has plenty of money being thrown at it on a daily basis, has game crippling issues, so don't be so critical with this small timer.

Checkout http://www.twitch.tv/drizzintahl/v/34640202 for a recent stream highlight of the game. 

If you haven't played any BR style game like this, here's what to expect.
-Camping
-Waiting
-Patience
-Dieing quickly to something you didn't see or hear after 10-15 minutes of nothing happening.
-Getting punched out early before you get anywhere
-Getting teamed up on in a FFA

Don't expect a fast paced action shooter, this is about getting lucky with item spawns, supply drops, food and water spawns, and knowing the map.  Right now players will clip through walls, rubberband horribly, and meleeing people is very difficult because of the skipping around.

all that aside, I personally love BR gameplay and you can't complain about this price tag.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037990414', 'num_games_owned': 1204, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1452473629}
review:
Game is a money grab.

1. Steam forums are official forum. Translation: We neither had the funding to hire a web developer, nor know how to create a discussion forum for our game so we're using Steam as a free one.
2. Has reached 1.0! Translation: This is the final product and full release. Included features are: General lack of physics, insane amount of bugs, completely broken animations, general lack of content.
3. There are virtually no servers. Transaltion: We will pull our servers in a matter of months leaving all players unable to play the game.
4. It cost 59 cents, and somehow didn't feel worth those 59 pennys.
5. In order to view the contact email it brings you to the Dev's youtube page.
6. When you declare a game to have "realistic bullet physics" it should have bullet drop and believable damage from guns. None of this seems to be in the game.
7. This game seems to attempt to piggyback off of Player Unknown's BattleRoyale mods for ArmA II, ArmA III, and H1Z1. The idea of a stand alone BR style game enthralled me. Then I launched it. It feels poorly done and incomplete.

In summation. This game feels like a poorly executed attempt to create a unique style of survival fps done by a dev who seems to have no knowledge of how a game like this should play or feel, and with no knowledge of how to properly set up a website for a game that presumably would be only successful if able to build a community, and it comes up short in all attempts and aspects. Were one, maybe two of the things I have listed true it might simply feel like an unoptimized poorly executed game. Sadly this is not the case.

If this game was not so broken it would be amazing. 

Here's how to play properly.

Step 1. DON'T BUY IT!
Step 2. Buy ArmA III
Step 3. Download Player Unknown's BattleRoyale
Step 4. Enjoy what this game was clearly trying to accomplish.

Maybe someday someone will make a standalone game of this type that doesn't suck. This is not that day, this is not that game, and whoever made this are not those people. I'd demand a refund, but honestly I could have used the 59 cents I paid for this on.... half a candy bar. So. No point.

review:

Cons: Your computer's hardware does not change the fact that this game is a potato. The movements are extremely choppy at any resolution and character models along with everything else are still clearly a very early access game quality. Also dead bodies often start flailing and crawling around with their heads spinning so there's that too.

But yeah for 59 cents it might turn into something playable in the future so if ur bored get it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025795328', 'num_games_owned': 603, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1480522582}
review:
Down To One est "une reprise de hunger games, Battle royale, etc."
Pour l'instant je mets un oui mais ce jeu est en tout point un jeu à ne pas acheter et non fini comme ark. J'espère que les développeurs régleront les gros problèmes (optimisation, hit box, ...), qu'ils feront comme les développeurs d’ark. Si tous les problèmes sont résolus alors ce jeu deviendra un jeu à ne pas manquer.

 Je l'ai acheter a moins de 1 euro il en valait 15 à sa sortie donc dans le pire des cas vous avez perdu 0.60 cts ce qui ne représente rien par rapport au joueur qui l'ont acheter 15euro ou les pigeons sur Cs: go :P . 

Si on a l'envie de régler les problèmes que l'on peut régler (jeu que en qwerty) et que l'on a le courage d'attendre que une partie ce finisse (7 serv au moment de l'éval) et de jouer à un jeu non opti (il faut être con mais bon on l'es tous un peu ^^) ce jeu peut être fun car le danger ne vient pas que des autre joueurs mais aussi des serpents, de la faim ou de la soif et l'on peut tout utiliser pour tuer les autres ennemis comme par exemple une pierre et l'on peut jouer au foot !!!
En conclusion c'est un jeu avec un grand potentiel au développeur de faire le taff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198250475334', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1452276022}
review:
Плюсы игры:
1) 17 мать вашу РУБЛЕЙ!!!
2)Тут нет голосового чата
3)Большой выбор оружия, которое спавнится прямо в воздухе
Больше плюсов я не нашел
Перейдем к минусам:
1)Нереалистичная отдача (как в антернеде)
2)Нет аптимезейшена . ибо почему при такой хреновой графе и на моем неслабом ПК идет 30 фпс?
3) Сама графика на уровне 2006 года( Графоуни сюда не приехал,оно и понятно Афганистан судя по рельефу)
4)Пинг 156 на всех серверах ( не знаю у всех ли так)
5)Непонятная система спавна
6)Лаги ,лаги ,лаги..........
7)Любой ящик можно залутать не открыв его
8)Ты праваливаешься или застреваешь в ужасно нарисованный текстурах все время
9)все люди инвалиды и аутисты (т.к. бегают будто у них сломаны ноги)
В общем о игре:
Ты спавнишся, бежишь из спавна, начинает лагать, тебя телепортирует, ты находишь оружие в воздухе, подбераешь его, пытаешься целится и стрелять (что невозможно),тебя как -то убивает чувак (который в свое время стреляет из рук ибо весит в воздухе), ты выходишь из игры, ты удоляешь игру,КОНЕЦ ИГРЕ
10удалений игры/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198130511788', 'num_games_owned': 114, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1453777176}
review:
1 попытка запустить игру: в начале игры ты становишься ПТИЦЕЙ!!! Ты буквально можешь летать по всей карте (разумеется сквозь текстуры) как будто достиг 50 lvl в Max Payne 3. Тебе словно говорят:"Только небо может быть преградой для тебя" точнее "треугольное небо". Игра сразу затягивает надолго, потому что кнопка disconnect не работает.

Немного о сюжете: ты - обычный военный, посланный в пустыню, чтобы найти и убить своих главных врагов - ЗМЕЙ! Попадаешь ты в эту пустыню с небес! (креатив от разработчиков). Разбившись о песок, оказываешься в штабе и... и... и... [Игра вылетает].

Игру всем советую, ведь она обладает удивительными свойствами, например: порассуждать над жизнью (во время лагов). Это словно как кинохит "Москва 2017" - только для разумных людей.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198043754318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1453326305}
review:
Okay lets start by saying I am a huge fan of survival games, it can really put skills to the test.

Now this game, it starts off with all the players in a sort of fort, obviously with the pure banter of just punching everyone (Damage is not dealt). The game starts by a few doors opening which means pretty much everyone is next to each other scavenging the few villages and buildings nearby, which is pretty.. well.. crap. Because of this, half the server dies within the first 5-10 minutes, axes swinging everywhere, it is complete chaos. I personally have reported the few bugs that I have come across (Fists covering the GUI, bodies ragdolling to the point where you cannot loot as their corpses are covering containers etc). 

Optimization, now this is key for a game, the spec requirements aren't that bad. Bear in mind that I have an R9 390x, with an I7. On Medium settings I am struggling to maintain 60..

Gameplay, it feels very, limited. Axes swing and you don't really get any feedback from when you actually hit someone, it's more of a groan then anything. Firearms are pretty overpowered, there doesn't seem to be any bullet spread? I can shoot someone from about 200 metres without aiming down sights aslong as their player is in the small squared crosshair.

Graphics, kind of ties in with optimization, it looks great, really does, but runs bad.

At this moment, I can only recommend because of the price tag. It is really cheap! I got this game for £0.47, you can actually (If you look hard enough) scavenge the inner city of london and practically find the change for it.

All in all, it is a promising looking game with a few bugs, that I hope the developer puts his foot down and fixes them up, as this could be a pretty decent indie title this year.

But for now, I will stick with Battle Royale on Arma 3, as this is a slight clone of it :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198044601833', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1452436242}

author: {'steamid': '76561198120127013', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1458665763}
review:
У вас есть 17 рублей и вы хотите потратить их максимально эффективно? Покупайте Down To One. 
Эта игра наделена высокодетализированным миром: Трава, скалы, песок, здания в арабском стиле- все идеально. Движок игры уникален, не знаю насколько он мощен, но прорабатывать такое количество деталей в секунду, даже крайенджен 4 позавидует такой мощности, а каков Геймплей.... мммм... 
Представьте что вас высадили где-то в Сахаре, из присутствующего у вас есть только костюм Американского спецназа, причем абсолютно пустой. Вас выпустили ничего не сказав, ничего не дав, ничего не пояснив - просто пнули и сказали: "Выживай!"
Первые пять минут (они же последние) были незабываемы, я продивагался по безлюдной пустыне, ничего не имея, нашел где-то в халупе огнетушитель и продолжил свой путь. После я дошел до армейского ящика с оружием, нашел там снайперскую винтовку и с мыслями о крассивых убийствах с соседней горы двинулся в путь однако не дошел, жажда оказалась сильней и за 5 минут я познал всю красоту, весь труд разрабов, всю мощь движка.
10 пустынь из 10.
P.S. А еще ваш герой любит телпеортироваться вперед назад на пол метра.
10/10

review: Questo gioco è il male concretizzato in un'fps buggato, dove il menù lagga, il caricamento lagga, i server laggano. I server sono sempre o pieni o vuoti, con attese lunghissime per entrare in un gioco dal cui gameplay e idea potrebbero essere """buone"""", similari ad un'hunger games, ma con una grafica di bassa categoria, bug ovunque, armi con fisica che farebbe suicidare Isaac Newton e un gameplay noioso e lungo. Non vale 99 cent, non vale 59 cent scontato, non varrebbe se fosse free2play. Vale solo per testare il pulsante per disinstallare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046208295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1452723109}
review: Down To One is a game where you and up to 41 other people loot and find food, drinks, and weapons to survive. The title of the game is what the very point of the game is, to be the one person remaining out of the 42 people. This game has a lot of potential and the reason why I am writing this review is to hopefully persuade you readers to buy this game and support the devs so that the game will get updated more often and be crafted into a masterpiece of a game. Also, for only $0.99 this game has pretty impressive graphics for the price, good textures, and pretty descent mechanics. Don't get me wrong though the game still has glitches and bugs but if we just be patient and wait the time that it takes for the game to be well updated, i'm sure the devs will give us a fun and quality product.

review: Didn't feel like posting a review until I saw all the negative. This game is fucking great. They've been saying that there are many game breaking bugs, however I have not noticed any. I only have one issue with this game, and that would be optimization. This game runs about as well as ArmA 2 did, Great for godly PC's, decent for good PC's, and shit for everyone else. With some optimization updates and more content this game could be one of the best Battle Royale games I've ever played.

review: This game feels incomplete. There are bugs around every corner. The animations are terrible and jagged. Your arms—mind you this is a first person game—cover most of your item UI and tutorial messages. There's no map even though the game tries to tell you to go to certain places on your map. AND to top it off the maps are HUGE and EMPTY. This wouldn't have been a good game 6 years ago.

review:
1• Start the game. > Game crash
2• Start it again and find a server. > Connected
3• Wait to spawn. > 15-20 minutes waiting time.
4• Before u can spawn the server will restart. > U will get disconnected.
5• Connect again , spawn and start get some good loot. > Game crash

Restart game and do all steps again.

1. 2. 3. 4. 5.

Kill some playes > Game crash

1.2. .....

Write that cool story and be happy with CounterStrike.
I want my money back.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014606119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1452399679}
review:
I like the idea of surviving in a map and finding things to kill other players and having my own perk system, so the game can be KINDA fun... when you get to play it; otherwise it turns into a full-fledged Waiting Simulator 2016.

Pros:
- Good concept
- Perk system
- Frequent updates, and devs are actually active in the forums, I give them that.

Cons:
- Terribly optimized
- Technically horrible
- Laughable animations and clipping issues (with also LE FUNNI ragdoll physics)
- Random server crashes
- Uh... your character's hands cover the GUI ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
- When you die you have to wait A LOT for the next round (and be lucky no one gets afk in a hidden place and people are about to kill each other to end the match).
- Very few servers (that most of the time are already in mid-game. Prepare to wait).
- Not really a con, but one thing to note. During Early Access, the game's price was 15 dollars, then it suddenly dropped to one (after the winter sale). The devs just wanted to increase the playerbase and that's fine, but I feel sorry for people who spent that much for it.
- e-Sports? Wow.

I encourage the devs to improve the game (even though that would be a lot of work) because it looks promising afterall. Just heavily unfinished.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089949005', 'num_games_owned': 247, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1460652424}
review:
*Down To One 
Симулятор Эпилепсии
*Мое Персональное мнение
Игра в стадии разработки, строго не сужу, но у разработчика(ков) много работы. Но все равно играть очень весело
+Радости:
Много смешных багов персонажа и анимаций(со стороны очень смешно)
Не плохая задумка, но надо сильно развивать идею
Хорошое графическое оформление (заставочки в меню :3)
-Печальки:
ЛАГИ,БАГИ,ПЛОХОЙ НЕТКОД
Долгие раунды (порой надо как-то направить двух последних игроков друг-на-друга)
Сервера - Очень большой пинг, очень мало самих сервов
Плохой скрипт
*P.S: Дорогие разработчики инди-игр, не выпускайте игр не доработав их до нормального уровня
(Сделайте альфа тест, не поленитесь найти людей которые всглянут на игру со стороны)

review:
Spawned in. Climbed a mountain chasing another player and beat him to death. Went and found an AR and some spam. Spent the next few minutes looking for someone to kill on a 24 player map. Die of dehydration. 

Join a new server, die as soon as I spawn to what looks like fall damage. Join another server. Die to what looks like fall damage again. Try six more servers, same thing. Make my way to the review section of the store page and write this review. 

5/7 would get steam refund again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010117511', 'num_games_owned': 781, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1459142546}
review:
Идея хорошая, но всё остальное сделано на коленке :/

Есть пару плюсов: 
— цена на игру
— хорошая идея
— нормальные модели оружия (это единственное нормальное в этой игре)
— вроде есть прокачка

Минусы: всё остальное
— модели всего, кроме оружия
— оптимизация
— вас кикнут с сервера, после матча (истории посещения серверов нет)
— вы можете умереть сразу после захода на сервер. Ну просто так
— если вы думаете заныкаться, не получиться: вас найду летающию змеи, которые могут ползать за вами по лестницвм и камням. 

Не, ну можете ради карточек взять, говорят они тут есть и они падают.

author: {'steamid': '76561198240939680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1480694851}
review:
Half of an hour of gameplay, can already give you a honest review.

I'm not going to slash the game down. It's in development. It's 59 cents when I bought it, so I'd say it's worth, if I wait it out until its fixed.

Pros: 
Nice Idea
Cheap
Good gun variation
Survival feel
No toxic people (except the people who say who bs it was that they died)
Devs still working on it
Weekly updates

Cons (Oh God):
Bugs. Thats it.
Poor optimization
You can glitch through walls
You can glitch though ladders
Buggy spectate
Animations not proper
The frames.. I get 15 on lowest settings and can play just cause 3 60 FPS on medium

Would I recommend?: yes. The Devs tr-.. I mean.. DEV tries hard to make his game good with weekly fixes. If you buy it now, and wait for the updates, one day, you'll have a battle royal modern warfare type game for $1. The price WILL go up if the game gets good. I would pick it up and try it a bit. people say its fun, if you're good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027900109', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1456860827}
review:
Muy buenas a todos a diferencia de la gran mayoría, yo pienso que el juego esta bien, es cierto que le falta un largo camino que recorrer pero las ideas que tienen se ven que son muy buenas y con algo de paciencia y tiempo este juego podría a llegar a estar muy bien, y para los "hater" les diré esto primero cuesta 60 céntimos (50 centavos)
no creo que sea una gran perdida para darle una oportunidad a una empresa que empieza con su primer juego y segundo reiterándome en lo antes dicho es una empresa indie y eso quiere decir que poca gente trabaja en este proyecto así que mucha paciencia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122785976', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1454873734}
review:
Partiamo dal presupposto che questo gioco è ottimizzato come lo schifo, la grafica fa schifo, il gameplay fa schifo ma se devo dirvi una cosa io vi dico che non ho mai riso così tanto in tutta la mia vita, questo è un gioco da giocare con amici e ci si diverte tantissimo, il prezzo è adeguato, ma se lo si deve vedere da un  punto di vista proffessionale gli do un 4/10 perchè le basi ci sono anche il concept è carino ma tutto ciò che gli gira attorno è lo schifo più totale.
In conclusione lo consiglio? Certo che si se si hanno soldi da buttare e si ha voglia di fare quattro risate in compagnia ma se pensate di prenderlo sul serio vi state sbagliado di grosso.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978866936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1452345081}
review:
I'm still not sure what had happened to me. For years I had simply been SWAT unit, tackling down the most dangerous criminals and hostile organisations to keep my city safe. Now, I had suddenly woken up in the middle east, along with a lot of other SWAT men.

We found little comfort in the small stone shack in which we were locked up and I could swear that some of my comrades had already succumbed to the madness of the desert. They began to hit one another. I kept my distance from them. A few moments later one of my comrades came walking towards me, hopping around in a manner which did not seem all that hostile.

FInally, the barricades keeping us locked in the stone ruins fell down and we all ascended down into the desert. The other officer which did not seem hostile was keen on following me but kept silent. 

We wandered the bare and empty desert and in the distance we saw one of our comrades get mauled down by a snake. This was truly a savage place. In the distance we noticed an abandoned village. We decided to scout it for food and water as we were growing thirsty and hungry. 

The loud buzzing of a drone filled our surroundings and we noticed a small device with red lights fly past us. Could someone be filming this entire process? Were we merely here for someone's amusement? A few moments later I had discovered a knife. I turned around and beheld my comrade's spine break as his body twisted forwards to grab a vase. He came towards me in a threatening manner. 

I had no choice but to cut him down. As his body fell down his neck extended and his limbs began to move in an inhuman manner. I fell down on my knees, madness had infested this place. I heard the footsteps of some of my other silent comrades behind me and I was punched down on the ground, the two silently beat me to death with their fists.

They were Down To One.

https://scontent-ams2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xft1/t31.0-8/12473611_10206943817212505_4305050842061084916_o.jpg

author: {'steamid': '76561198038025084', 'num_games_owned': 655, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 729, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1588708466}
review:
Al juego todavía le queda mucho camino, ya que por el momento funciona bastante mal y no está demasiado pulido. Las animaciones la verdad es que son bastante malas y te sueles quedar buggeado en muchos sitios.

Aun con lo malo, este juego es bastante divertido, yo le he echado bastantes partidas ya y me lo estoy pasando genial, sobre todo teniendo en cuenta que solo me ha costado 60 céntimos. El juego lo actualizan bastante y tengo fé en que poco a poco vayan corrigiendo todo lo malo que tenga.

La idea del juego es buena y muy divertida, pero le falta mucho por pulir, aun así, por 60 céntimos yo creo que vale la pena, pero tienes que saber que estás comprando algo que realmente no está terminado.
